title: Coincidence Algebra Bundle for Decay Quivers: An Algebraic Approach to Gamma-ray Spectroscopy
summary: Motivated by the need for a more comprehensive algebraic structure to calculate coincidence probabilities of a general decay scheme for gamma ray spectroscopy, we model the decay scheme, rather naturally, as a quiver through which we define a decay quiver. The path algebra of quivers is the underlying, more general, algebra for transition matrices that is typically used in modeling decay schemes. The path algebra allows for concatenation of transitions which affords the calculation of cascade probabilities. We extend the path algebra to allow for the multiplication of non-composable paths, i.e., transition that don't directly share a level connecting them. We define the coincidence algebra as the algebra that allows for such an extension and realize it as the fibres for a coincidence algebra bundle, the base space of which is the path algebra where decay schemes live. A given decay schemes coincidence probabilities are calculated on its fibre. \textit{Detection maps} are defined as linear maps on the base space that map transition probabilities to detected probabilities.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出使用箭图（quiver）和路径代数来建模衰变方案，通过定义衰变箭图和巧合代数来计算伽马射线能谱学中的级联衰变概率。
AI.motivation: 伽马射线能谱学需要更全面的代数结构来计算一般衰变方案的巧合概率，传统方法使用的转移矩阵代数结构不够通用。
AI.method: 将衰变方案建模为箭图，定义衰变箭图，使用路径代数作为基础代数结构。扩展路径代数以允许非可组合路径的乘法，定义巧合代数，并将其实现为巧合代数丛的纤维。
AI.result: 建立了衰变方案的代数框架，衰变方案位于路径代数的基础空间中，其巧合概率在对应的纤维上计算。定义了检测映射，将转移概率映射到检测概率。
AI.conclusion: 箭图路径代数为衰变方案提供了更通用的代数结构，巧合代数框架能够系统计算级联衰变概率，为伽马射线能谱学提供了新的数学工具。

title: Analysis framework for higher-order temporal correlations with applications to human heartbeats
summary: We propose a time series analysis framework focused on higher-order temporal correlations in the event sequence beyond the interevent time distribution by employing the burst-tree decomposition method. Bursts are clustered events that rapidly occur within shorter time periods, and they are separated by relatively longer inactive periods. The burst-tree decomposition method exactly maps the event sequence onto a tree, called a burst tree, in which each internal node represents a merge of consecutive bursts at the timescale separating those bursts. The burst tree fully reveals the hierarchical structure of bursts, hence the higher-order temporal correlations for the entire range of timescales. Those correlations are quantified using novel and existing measures derived from the burst tree, such as the burst complexity, memory coefficient for bursts, and principal and secondary cross sections of the burst-merging kernel. We apply our framework to the heartbeat time series of healthy people and of those with heart disease to reveal distinct multiscale temporal properties in physiological time series.

AI.tldr: 提出基于爆发树分解的时间序列分析框架，专注于事件序列中超越事件间隔分布的高阶时间相关性，应用于健康与心脏病患者的心跳时间序列分析。
AI.motivation: 传统时间序列分析主要关注事件间隔分布，但忽略了更高阶的时间相关性。本文旨在开发一个能够全面揭示事件序列中多层次时间相关性的分析框架。
AI.method: 采用爆发树分解方法，将事件序列精确映射到树结构（爆发树），其中每个内部节点代表在特定时间尺度上连续爆发的合并。通过爆发树量化高阶时间相关性，包括爆发复杂性、爆发记忆系数、爆发合并核的主截面和次截面等新老度量指标。
AI.result: 该框架成功应用于健康人群和心脏病患者的心跳时间序列分析，揭示了生理时间序列中不同的多尺度时间特性。
AI.conclusion: 爆发树分解方法为分析事件序列中的高阶时间相关性提供了有效框架，能够揭示传统方法无法检测到的多层次时间结构差异，在生理时间序列分析中显示出应用价值。

title: Measuring What LLMs Think They Do: SHAP Faithfulness and Deployability on Financial Tabular Classification
comment: 7 pages, 3 figures, 3 tables, AAAI 2026 Deployable AI Workshop
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) have attracted significant attention for classification tasks, offering a flexible alternative to trusted classical machine learning models like LightGBM through zero-shot prompting. However, their reliability for structured tabular data remains unclear, particularly in high stakes applications like financial risk assessment. Our study systematically evaluates LLMs and generates their SHAP values on financial classification tasks. Our analysis shows a divergence between LLMs self-explanation of feature impact and their SHAP values, as well as notable differences between LLMs and LightGBM SHAP values. These findings highlight the limitations of LLMs as standalone classifiers for structured financial modeling, but also instill optimism that improved explainability mechanisms coupled with few-shot prompting will make LLMs usable in risk-sensitive domains.

AI.tldr: 该研究评估了大型语言模型在金融分类任务中的表现，发现其自解释特征影响与SHAP值存在差异，且与LightGBM的SHAP值也有显著不同，表明LLMs作为结构化金融建模的独立分类器存在局限性。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型在分类任务中受到关注，可作为传统机器学习模型的灵活替代方案，但其在结构化表格数据（特别是金融风险评估等高风险应用）中的可靠性尚不明确。
AI.method: 系统评估LLMs在金融分类任务上的表现，并生成其SHAP值进行分析比较。
AI.result: 发现LLMs的自解释特征影响与其SHAP值存在分歧，且LLMs与LightGBM的SHAP值有显著差异。
AI.conclusion: LLMs作为结构化金融建模的独立分类器存在局限性，但通过改进可解释性机制结合少量样本提示，LLMs有望在风险敏感领域得到应用。

title: Exploring the apparent violation of the Mott relation in a noncentrosymmetric kagome ferromagnet
summary: In magnetic topological materials, time-reversal symmetry breaking gives rise to topological point and line nodes with distinctive signatures in the anomalous Hall and anomalous Nernst conductivity that satisfy the well-known Mott relation. However, this relationship can fail for doping-dependent transport measurements of materials with complex magnetism, topology, and electronic correlations. In this work, we present transport measurements of the correlated topological metal UCoAl doped with Ru, which appear to violate the Mott relation. We develop a model that captures the evolution of Stoner magnetism and topological Weyl points as a function of doping. Using this model, we show how the correlated flat band in this material pins the Weyl points to the Fermi energy, and demonstrate how this explains the unusual doping-dependent behavior of the anomalous Hall and anomalous Nernst conductivities in this material, while the Mott relation is in fact satisfied at each doping level.

AI.tldr: UCoAl掺杂Ru的输运测量显示违反Mott关系，但实际模型表明每个掺杂水平下Mott关系仍成立，异常霍尔和异常能斯特电导的异常掺杂依赖行为源于关联平带将Weyl点钉扎在费米能级。
AI.motivation: 研究磁性拓扑材料中时间反演对称性破缺导致的拓扑点和线节点在异常霍尔和异常能斯特电导中的特征，这些特征通常满足Mott关系。但在具有复杂磁性、拓扑和电子关联的材料中，掺杂依赖的输运测量可能违反这一关系。
AI.method: 1. 对掺杂Ru的关联拓扑金属UCoAl进行输运测量；2. 开发一个模型来捕捉掺杂依赖的Stoner磁性和拓扑Weyl点演化；3. 使用该模型分析关联平带如何将Weyl点钉扎在费米能级。
AI.result: 测量显示UCoAl掺杂Ru的异常霍尔和异常能斯特电导表现出异常的掺杂依赖行为，看似违反Mott关系。但模型分析表明，在每个掺杂水平下Mott关系实际上都成立，异常行为源于关联平带将Weyl点钉扎在费米能级。
AI.conclusion: UCoAl掺杂Ru的输运测量看似违反Mott关系，但通过考虑关联平带将Weyl点钉扎在费米能级的机制，可以解释异常霍尔和异常能斯特电导的掺杂依赖行为，同时确认Mott关系在每个掺杂水平下仍然成立。

title: Data assimilation and discrepancy modeling with shallow recurrent decoders
summary: The requirements of modern sensing are rapidly evolving, driven by increasing demands for data efficiency, real-time processing, and deployment under limited sensing coverage. Complex physical systems are often characterized through the integration of a limited number of point sensors in combination with scientific computations which approximate the dominant, full-state dynamics. Simulation models, however, inevitably neglect small-scale or hidden processes, are sensitive to perturbations, or oversimplify parameter correlations, leading to reconstructions that often diverge from the reality measured by sensors. This creates a critical need for data assimilation, the process of integrating observational data with predictive simulation models to produce coherent and accurate estimates of the full state of complex physical systems. We propose a machine learning framework for Data Assimilation with a SHallow REcurrent Decoder (DA-SHRED) which bridges the simulation-to-real (SIM2REAL) gap between computational modeling and experimental sensor data. For real-world physics systems modeling high-dimensional spatiotemporal fields, where the full state cannot be directly observed and must be inferred from sparse sensor measurements, we leverage the latent space learned from a reduced simulation model via SHRED, and update these latent variables using real sensor data to accurately reconstruct the full system state. Furthermore, our algorithm incorporates a sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics based regression model in the latent space to identify functionals corresponding to missing dynamics in the simulation model. We demonstrate that DA-SHRED successfully closes the SIM2REAL gap and additionally recovers missing dynamics in highly complex systems, demonstrating that the combination of efficient temporal encoding and physics-informed correction enables robust data assimilation.

AI.tldr: DA-SHRED是一个机器学习框架，通过浅层循环解码器结合仿真模型和真实传感器数据进行数据同化，填补仿真到现实的差距，并恢复仿真模型中缺失的动态过程。
AI.motivation: 现代传感需求日益增长，需要数据效率、实时处理和在有限传感覆盖下的部署。复杂物理系统通常通过有限点传感器结合科学计算来表征，但仿真模型往往忽略小尺度或隐藏过程，对扰动敏感，或过度简化参数相关性，导致重建结果与传感器测量的现实存在偏差。这产生了对数据同化的关键需求，即整合观测数据与预测仿真模型以产生复杂物理系统完整状态的准确估计。
AI.method: 提出DA-SHRED（Data Assimilation with a SHallow REcurrent Decoder）框架，利用SHRED从简化仿真模型中学习潜在空间，然后使用真实传感器数据更新这些潜在变量以准确重建完整系统状态。算法还在潜在空间中结合基于稀疏非线性动力学识别的回归模型，识别仿真模型中缺失动态对应的函数形式。
AI.result: DA-SHRED成功填补了仿真到现实的差距，并在高度复杂系统中恢复了缺失的动态过程。表明高效时间编码和物理信息校正的结合能够实现鲁棒的数据同化。
AI.conclusion: DA-SHRED框架通过结合仿真模型和真实传感器数据，有效解决了复杂物理系统数据同化问题，不仅填补了仿真到现实的差距，还能识别和恢复仿真模型中缺失的动态过程，为高维时空场建模提供了有效的解决方案。

title: Tailoring Bell inequalities to the qudit toric code and self testing
summary: Bell nonlocality provides a robust scalable route to the efficient certification of quantum states. Here, we introduce a general framework for constructing Bell inequalities tailored to the $\mathbb{Z}_d$ toric code for odd prime local dimensions. Selecting a suitable subset of stabilizer operators and mapping them to generalized measurement observables, we compute multipartite Bell expressions whose quantum maxima admit a sum-of-squares decomposition. We show that these inequalities are maximally violated by all states in the ground-state manifold of the $\mathbb{Z}_d$ toric code, and determine their classical (local) bounds through a combination of combinatorial tiling arguments and explicit optimization. As a concrete application, we analyze the case of $d=3$ and demonstrate that the maximal violation self-tests the full qutrit toric-code subspace, up to local isometries and complex conjugation. This constitutes, to our knowledge, the first-ever example of self-testing a qutrit subspace. Extending these constructions, we further present schemes to enhance the ratio of classical--quantum bounds and thus improve robustness to experimental imperfections. Our results establish a pathway toward device-independent certification of highly entangled topological quantum matter and provide new tools for validating qudit states in error-correcting codes and quantum simulation platforms.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个为奇素数维度Z_d环面码构建贝尔不等式的通用框架，实现了对量子拓扑物质的无设备认证，并首次展示了三能级量子比特子空间的自测试。
AI.motivation: 贝尔非定域性为高效认证量子态提供了稳健可扩展的途径。本文旨在为拓扑量子物质（特别是Z_d环面码）开发无设备认证工具，这对于量子纠错码和量子模拟平台的验证至关重要。
AI.method: 作者构建了一个通用框架：1）选择合适的稳定子算子子集；2）将其映射到广义测量可观测量；3）计算多体贝尔表达式，其量子最大值允许平方和分解；4）通过组合平铺论证和显式优化确定经典（局域）界限。
AI.result: 1）构建的贝尔不等式被Z_d环面码的所有基态流形最大违反；2）以d=3为例，最大违反自测试了完整的三能级环面码子空间（局部等距和复共轭下）；3）提出了增强经典-量子界限比率的方案以提高实验鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为高度纠缠拓扑量子物质的无设备认证建立了途径，为验证量子纠错码和量子模拟平台中的量子比特态提供了新工具，并首次实现了三能级量子比特子空间的自测试。

title: Dissipation and fluctuations of CMOS ring oscillators close to criticality
summary: We analyze a thermodynamically consistent model of CMOS-based ring oscillators near the onset of coherent voltage oscillations. For driving voltages close to the critical value, we derive the normal form of the Hopf bifurcation that underlies the oscillation transition in the thermodynamic limit. Using this normal form, we determine the phase and amplitude dynamics, and demonstrate that entropy dissipation decreases in the oscillating state for ring oscillators with more than three inverters. These findings culminate in a stability-dissipation relation, which links the observed decrease in dissipation to an increase in the local stability of the oscillating state. Next, we characterize finite-size fluctuations of the amplitude and phase near the critical voltage, using a stochastic version of the normal form. We demonstrate that close to the transition, finite-size fluctuations remain important at arbitrary system size, introducing oscillations even below the critical voltage. We further show that these noise-induced oscillations have an anomalously short decoherence time that scales sub-linearly with the system-size, in contrast to the behavior far from criticality.

AI.tldr: 该论文分析了CMOS环形振荡器在相干电压振荡起始点附近的热力学一致模型，推导了Hopf分岔的正规形式，发现振荡状态下熵耗散减少，建立了稳定性-耗散关系，并研究了临界电压附近的有限尺寸涨落效应。
AI.motivation: 研究CMOS环形振荡器在振荡起始点附近的热力学行为，特别是理解振荡状态下的熵耗散变化以及有限尺寸效应对振荡特性的影响。
AI.method: 使用热力学一致模型分析CMOS环形振荡器，在临界电压附近推导Hopf分岔的正规形式，基于此分析相位和振幅动力学，并引入随机正规形式研究有限尺寸涨落。
AI.result: 发现对于超过三个反相器的环形振荡器，振荡状态下熵耗散减少；建立了稳定性与耗散之间的关系；证明了在临界电压附近，有限尺寸涨落导致临界电压以下出现噪声诱导振荡，且退相干时间随系统尺寸呈亚线性缩放。
AI.conclusion: CMOS环形振荡器在振荡起始点附近表现出独特的热力学行为，振荡状态下的熵耗散减少与局部稳定性增加相关，有限尺寸效应在临界区域显著影响振荡特性，这些发现对理解纳米尺度振荡器的热力学行为具有重要意义。

title: Robust semiclassical magnetization plateau in the kagome lattice
summary: Inspired by recent observations of the $1/3$ magnetization plateau in kagome-based magnets, we investigate the $J_1-J_2$ Heisenberg model on the kagome lattice under the influence of an external magnetic field. Although the classical ground state at zero field depends on the sign of $J_2$, we find a robust $1/3$ semiclassical magnetization plateau in both cases. The mechanism that stabilizes this plateau is analogous to that observed in the triangular lattice, where quantum fluctuations select a collinear state from the degenerate classical manifold. We calculate the plateau width, which shows a weak dependence on $J_2$, using nonlinear spin-wave theory. Additionally, we find that a straightforward approach based on linear spin-wave yields quantitatively accurate results even for $S=1/2$. Furthermore, we identify a magnetization jump at the saturation field when $J_2=0$; this jump is related to the presence of a flat band and disappears for $J_2 \neq 0$. Our study demonstrates that a semiclassical approach effectively captures the $1/3$ plateau in the kagome lattice and serves as a valuable tool for interpreting experimental and numerical results alike.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了在磁场作用下kagome晶格上的J1-J2海森堡模型，发现了稳健的1/3磁化平台，其稳定机制类似于三角晶格中的量子涨落选择机制。
AI.motivation: 受kagome基磁体中观察到的1/3磁化平台现象的启发，研究者在磁场作用下研究kagome晶格上的J1-J2海森堡模型，旨在理解这一平台现象的物理机制。
AI.method: 采用半经典方法，包括非线性自旋波理论和线性自旋波理论，计算了1/3磁化平台的宽度，并分析了J2参数的影响。
AI.result: 发现无论J2的符号如何，都存在稳健的1/3半经典磁化平台；平台宽度对J2的依赖性较弱；当J2=0时存在与平带相关的磁化跳跃；线性自旋波方法即使对S=1/2也能给出定量准确的结果。
AI.conclusion: 半经典方法能有效捕捉kagome晶格中的1/3磁化平台现象，为解释实验和数值结果提供了有价值的工具。

title: On the Dynamics of Multiparticle Carroll-Schrdinger Quantum Systems
summary: We study the dynamics of multiparticle Carroll-Schrödinger (CS) quantum systems in $1{+}1$ dimensions, where $x$ acts as the evolution variable and $t$ as the configuration coordinate. We derive the $N$-body theory on equal-$x$ slices as the Carrollian limit of a relativistic multi-time Klein-Gordon model, introducing temporal interactions via minimal coupling to the temporal energy operators. An $x$-dependent gauge transformation maps this to an equivalent description with explicit many-body potentials, illustrated by a temporal coupled-oscillator model that exhibits synchronization. Adopting a complementary spatial viewpoint with a static potential $U_{\!tot}(\mathbf x)$, we show that the evolution is driven by the collective force $\sum_j\partial_{x_j}U_{\!tot}$; for any translation-invariant interaction (such as a regularized Coulomb potential), these internal forces cancel, rendering the collective dynamics free and highlighting Carrollian ultralocality. We also construct a coordinate duality mapping separable Schrödinger Hamiltonians to CS generators via Schwarzian derivatives. Exchange symmetry is formulated in the time domain, yielding temporal bunching for bosons and antibunching for fermions via the second-order coherence function $g^{(2)}(t,t')$. In second quantization, the contact limit yields a temporal derivative cubic--quintic nonlinear Schrödinger equation with a theoretically fixed nonlinearity coefficient $β=-3/16$. Finally, by coupling canonical pairs to external scalar and gauge fields, we establish an isomorphism with one-dimensional current-density functional theory, outlining a Carrollian Hohenberg-Kohn mapping and Kohn-Sham scheme.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了1+1维多粒子Carroll-Schrödinger量子系统的动力学，探讨了时间作为配置坐标的特殊性质，建立了从相对论多时间Klein-Gordon模型到Carroll极限的映射，并分析了时间域中的交换对称性、二次量子化以及Carrollian Hohenberg-Kohn映射。
AI.motivation: 研究Carroll-Schrödinger量子系统的动机在于探索当光速趋于零时（Carroll极限）的量子动力学特性，特别是时间作为配置坐标而非演化参数的特殊情况。这种极限下的系统展现出超局域性等独特性质，对理解极端相对论极限下的量子行为具有重要意义。
AI.method: 方法包括：1）从相对论多时间Klein-Gordon模型推导Carroll极限下的N体理论；2）通过x依赖的规范变换将时间相互作用映射为显式多体势；3）采用空间视角分析集体动力学；4）构造坐标对偶映射将可分离Schrödinger哈密顿量映射到CS生成元；5）在时间域中表述交换对称性；6）通过二次量子化得到时间导数立方-五次非线性Schrödinger方程；7）建立与一维电流密度泛函理论的同构关系。
AI.result: 主要结果：1）证明了对于任何平移不变相互作用，内部力相互抵消，集体动力学是自由的，体现了Carroll超局域性；2）时间耦合振子模型展现出同步现象；3）在时间域中，玻色子表现出时间聚束，费米子表现出时间反聚束；4）接触极限下得到非线性系数β=-3/16的时间导数立方-五次非线性Schrödinger方程；5）建立了Carrollian Hohenberg-Kohn映射和Kohn-Sham方案。
AI.conclusion: 结论：Carroll-Schrödinger量子系统在1+1维中展现出丰富的物理特性，包括时间作为配置坐标的特殊动力学、超局域性、时间域中的量子统计效应，以及与密度泛函理论的深刻联系。这些结果为理解极端相对论极限下的量子多体系统提供了新的理论框架。

title: First Passage Resetting Gas
summary: We study a one-dimensional gas of $N$ Brownian particles that diffuse independently but are simultaneously reset whenever any of them reaches a fixed threshold located at $L > 0$. For any $N > 2$, the system reaches a non-equilibrium stationary state (NESS) at long-times with strong long-range correlations. These correlations emerge purely from the dynamics, and not from built-in interactions. Despite being strongly correlated, the NESS has a solvable structure that allows for an exact computation of several physical observables, both global and local. These include the average density profile, the distribution of the position of the $k$-th ordered particles, the distribution of the gap between two consecutive particles and the full counting statistics, i.e., the distribution of the number of particles in a finite interval around the origin.

AI.tldr: 研究N个布朗粒子在一维扩散中的集体重置动力学：当任一粒子到达阈值L时，所有粒子同时重置，形成非平衡稳态并产生强长程关联。
AI.motivation: 探索多粒子系统中通过集体重置机制产生的非平衡稳态，研究无内置相互作用下仅通过动力学产生的强关联现象。
AI.method: 建立N个布朗粒子的一维扩散模型，当任一粒子到达固定阈值L时，所有粒子同时重置，分析系统的长时间行为和非平衡稳态。
AI.result: 系统达到可解析的非平衡稳态，具有强长程关联；精确计算了平均密度分布、有序粒子位置分布、粒子间隙分布以及原点附近有限区间内粒子数的全计数统计。
AI.conclusion: 集体重置机制可在无内置相互作用的多粒子系统中产生强长程关联，形成可解析的非平衡稳态，为研究非平衡统计物理提供了新范例。

title: Chunking Strategies for Multimodal AI Systems
summary: Our goal is to consolidate the landscape of multimodal chunking strategies, providing researchers and practitioners with a technical foundation and design space for developing more effective and efficient multimodal AI systems. This survey paves the way for innovations in robust chunking pipelines that scale with modality complexity, enhance processing accuracy, and improve generative coherence in real-world applications. This survey provides a comprehensive taxonomy and technical analysis of chunking strategies tailored for each modality: text, images, audio, video, and cross-modal data. We examine classical and modern approaches such as fixed-size token windowing, recursive text splitting, object-centric visual chunking, silence-based audio segmentation, and scene detection in videos. Each approach is analyzed in terms of its underlying methodology, supporting tools (e.g., LangChain, Detectron2, PySceneDetect), benefits, and challenges, particularly those related to granularity-context trade-offs and multimodal alignment. Furthermore, we explore emerging cross-modal chunking strategies that aim to preserve alignment and semantic consistency across disparate data types [4]. We also include comparative insights, highlight open problems such as asynchronous information density and noisy alignment signals, and identify opportunities for future research in adaptive, learning-based, and task-specific chunking.

AI.tldr: 这篇综述系统梳理了多模态分块策略的技术全景，为开发更高效的多模态AI系统提供技术基础和设计空间，涵盖文本、图像、音频、视频和跨模态数据的分块方法。
AI.motivation: 整合多模态分块策略的研究现状，为研究者和实践者提供技术基础，促进开发更有效和高效的多模态AI系统，解决实际应用中模态复杂性、处理准确性和生成连贯性的挑战。
AI.method: 采用系统性综述方法，建立全面的分类体系和技术分析框架，针对每种模态（文本、图像、音频、视频、跨模态数据）分别分析经典和现代分块策略，包括固定大小令牌窗口、递归文本分割、对象中心视觉分块、基于静音的音频分割、视频场景检测等方法。
AI.result: 提供了多模态分块策略的全面技术分析，比较了不同方法的优缺点，识别了粒度-上下文权衡、多模态对齐等关键挑战，并指出了异步信息密度、噪声对齐信号等开放问题。
AI.conclusion: 该综述为多模态AI系统的分块策略提供了系统性的技术基础，指出了未来研究方向，包括自适应、基于学习和任务特定的分块方法，为开发更鲁棒、可扩展的多模态处理管道铺平了道路。

title: Circular current induced by angular dynamics in swarmalator populations
comment: 19 pages, 5 figures, to appear in J. Stat. Mech.: Theory Exp
summary: We propose a modified swarmalator model that generates collective rotational currents in phase synchronization. Our approach builds on the original swarmalator model [4], introducing a key modification: the phase-dependent terms in the spatial dynamics are replaced with a simpler driving term that depends on both the phase and a specified origin. We investigate the dynamics of this model through extensive numerical simulations. When the origin is fixed, spiral motions of synchronized and clustered swarmalators emerge from a finite fraction of random initial conditions, resulting in collective currents. To prevent the unrealistic divergence of these spirals, we introduce a dynamic origin, defined as the center of the swarmalators' positions. With this dynamic origin, the system evolves into rotating collective currents, where synchronized swarmalators form stable circular patterns. In both the fixed and dynamic origin cases, we also observe no-current states, in which synchronized swarmalators aggregate near the origin. Finally, we find that the formation of collective currents can be facilitated by tuning the phase variables either at initialization or during the system's evolution.

AI.tldr: 提出改进的swarmalator模型，通过引入相位依赖的空间驱动项，在相位同步中产生集体旋转流
AI.motivation: 在原始swarmalator模型基础上，探索如何生成集体旋转电流，研究相位同步与空间运动的耦合机制
AI.method: 修改原始swarmalator模型，用依赖于相位和指定原点的简单驱动项替换空间动力学中的相位依赖项；通过数值模拟研究固定原点和动态原点两种情况下的系统行为
AI.result: 固定原点时，从随机初始条件中涌现出螺旋运动，形成集体电流；动态原点时，系统演化为稳定的旋转集体电流，形成圆形模式；两种情况下都观察到无电流状态；通过调整相位变量可以促进集体电流的形成
AI.conclusion: 改进的swarmalator模型能够有效产生集体旋转电流，为理解相位同步与集体运动之间的耦合提供了新视角

title: We Still Don't Understand High-Dimensional Bayesian Optimization
summary: High-dimensional spaces have challenged Bayesian optimization (BO). Existing methods aim to overcome this so-called curse of dimensionality by carefully encoding structural assumptions, from locality to sparsity to smoothness, into the optimization procedure. Surprisingly, we demonstrate that these approaches are outperformed by arguably the simplest method imaginable: Bayesian linear regression. After applying a geometric transformation to avoid boundary-seeking behavior, Gaussian processes with linear kernels match state-of-the-art performance on tasks with 60- to 6,000-dimensional search spaces. Linear models offer numerous advantages over their non-parametric counterparts: they afford closed-form sampling and their computation scales linearly with data, a fact we exploit on molecular optimization tasks with > 20,000 observations. Coupled with empirical analyses, our results suggest the need to depart from past intuitions about BO methods in high-dimensional spaces.

AI.tldr: 贝叶斯线性回归在高维优化中表现优于复杂方法，通过几何变换避免边界搜索行为，在60-6000维任务中达到SOTA性能
AI.motivation: 高维空间对贝叶斯优化提出了挑战，现有方法通过编码各种结构假设来应对维度诅咒，但作者发现这些复杂方法被最简单的贝叶斯线性回归所超越
AI.method: 使用高斯过程配合线性核函数，并应用几何变换来避免边界搜索行为；线性模型提供闭式采样，计算复杂度随数据线性增长
AI.result: 在60-6000维搜索空间的任务中，线性核高斯过程达到了最先进的性能；在超过20,000个观测的分子优化任务中展示了线性计算优势
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明需要重新思考高维空间中贝叶斯优化的传统直觉，线性模型在高维优化中具有显著优势

title: Magnetosynthesis effect on the structure and ground state of Cu$^{2+}$-based antiferromagnets
summary: Subtle synthetic variables can have an outsizes influence on the crystal structure and magnetic properties of a material, particularly those of quantum materials. In this work, we investigate the impact of synthesis under a magnetic field (magnetosynthesis) on the crystal structure and magnetic properties of several Cu$^{2+}$ ($S=1/2$) based materials with antiferromagnetic interactions and varying levels of magnetic frustration, from simple antiferromagnets to a quantum spin liquid. We employ small (0.09 - 0.37 T) magnetic fields applied during low-temperature hydrothermal or evaporative synthesis of the simple antiferromagnet CuCl$_2\cdot$2H$_2$O, the canted antiferromagnet (Cu,Zn)$_3$Cl$_4$(OH)$_2\cdot$2H$_2$O, the frustrated and canted antiferromagnet atacamite Cu$_2$(OH)$_3$Cl, and the highly frustrated quantum spin liquid herbertsmithite Cu$_3$Zn(OH)$_6$Cl$_2$. We found that (Cu,Zn)$_3$Cl$_4$(OH)$_2\cdot$2H$_2$O experiences structural changes well above its magnetic transition. Atacamite Cu$_2$(OH)$_3$Cl synthesized under a 0.19 T field experiences a 0.15 K (~3%) decrease in its Néel transition temperature and a significant strengthening of its antiferromagnetic interactions, suggesting that magnetosynthesis can influence the ground state of moderately frustrated materials.

AI.tldr: 研究磁场合成对几种Cu²⁺基反铁磁材料的晶体结构和磁性能的影响，发现磁场合成能显著改变材料的磁相变温度和相互作用强度。
AI.motivation: 合成过程中的细微变量（如磁场）可能对量子材料的晶体结构和磁性能产生重大影响，特别是对于具有反铁磁相互作用和不同磁阻挫水平的材料。
AI.method: 在低温水热或蒸发合成过程中施加小磁场（0.09-0.37 T），研究四种Cu²⁺基材料：简单反铁磁体CuCl₂·2H₂O、倾斜反铁磁体(Cu,Zn)₃Cl₄(OH)₂·2H₂O、阻挫倾斜反铁磁体atacamite Cu₂(OH)₃Cl，以及高度阻挫量子自旋液体herbertsmithite Cu₃Zn(OH)₆Cl₂。
AI.result: (Cu,Zn)₃Cl₄(OH)₂·2H₂O在其磁相变温度以上出现结构变化；在0.19 T磁场下合成的atacamite Cu₂(OH)₃Cl的尼尔转变温度降低了0.15 K（约3%），且反铁磁相互作用显著增强，表明磁场合成能影响中等阻挫材料的基态。
AI.conclusion: 磁场合成能够显著影响Cu²⁺基反铁磁材料的晶体结构和磁性能，特别是对中等阻挫材料，磁场合成可以改变其基态性质，这为调控量子材料的性能提供了新途径。

title: Universal asymptotic solution of the Fokker-Planck equation with time-dependent periodic potentials
summary: Brownian motion, as one of the most fundamental concepts in statistical physics, has everlasting interests in interdisciplinary fields in the past century. Although this motion with static potentials have been widely explored, its physics in time-dependent periodic potentials are far less well understood. Here we generalize this motion to the realm of time-dependent periodic potentials, showing that the asymptotic solution of the probability distribution function (PDF) can have a universal form, that is, a Boltzmann weight multiplied by a Gaussian envelope function. We derive a partial equation for this Boltzmann weight and demonstrate that many different potentials can give the same Boltzmann weight. We first present an exact solvable model to illustrate the validity of our solution. For the periodic potential with a time-dependent tilt potential, we can determine the Boltzmann weight by numerical solving the partial equation. These results are confirmed by solving the Langevin equation numerically. With this idea, we can determine the asymptotic solution of the Fokker-Planck equation, in which the entropy satisfies the thermodynamic law. Our results can have wide applications, including quasi-periodic potentials, two-dimensional potentials and even with models with inertia, which should greatly broaden our perspective of Brownian motion.

AI.tldr: 该研究将布朗运动推广到时变周期势场中，发现概率分布函数的渐近解具有普适形式：玻尔兹曼权重乘以高斯包络函数。
AI.motivation: 布朗运动作为统计物理学中最基本的概念之一，在静态势场中已被广泛研究，但在时变周期势场中的物理特性远未得到充分理解。研究者希望将布朗运动推广到这一新领域，探索其普适特性。
AI.method: 1. 推导概率分布函数渐近解的普适形式：玻尔兹曼权重乘以高斯包络函数；2. 建立玻尔兹曼权重的偏微分方程；3. 通过精确可解模型验证解的有效性；4. 对含时变倾斜势的周期势，通过数值求解偏微分方程确定玻尔兹曼权重；5. 通过数值求解朗之万方程验证结果。
AI.result: 1. 证明了时变周期势场中布朗运动的概率分布函数渐近解具有普适形式；2. 发现许多不同的势场可以给出相同的玻尔兹曼权重；3. 精确可解模型验证了理论解的有效性；4. 数值求解证实了理论预测；5. 福克-普朗克方程的渐近解满足热力学定律。
AI.conclusion: 该研究将布朗运动扩展到时变周期势场，发现了概率分布函数渐近解的普适形式，这一结果可广泛应用于准周期势、二维势场乃至含惯性模型，极大地拓宽了人们对布朗运动的理解视角。

title: A Rosetta Stone for AI Benchmarks
summary: Most AI benchmarks saturate within years or even months after they are introduced, making it hard to study long-run trends in AI capabilities. To address this challenge, we build a statistical framework that stitches benchmarks together, putting model capabilities and benchmark difficulties on a single numerical scale. This acts as a "Rosetta Stone", allowing us to compare models across a wide range of abilities and time, even if they are not evaluated on the same benchmarks. Moreover, this works without assuming how capabilities evolve across time or with training compute. We demonstrate three applications of this framework. First, we use it to measure the speed of AI progress over time, and to forecast future AI capabilities. Second, we estimate the rate of improvements in algorithmic efficiency, finding estimates that are higher, but broadly consistent with prior work. Finally, we find that our approach can be used to detect rapid accelerations in AI progress.

AI.tldr: 该研究构建了一个统计框架，将不同AI基准测试统一到单一数值尺度上，解决了传统基准测试快速饱和、难以追踪长期AI能力趋势的问题。
AI.motivation: 大多数AI基准测试在推出后几年甚至几个月内就会饱和，这使得研究AI能力的长期趋势变得困难。需要一种能够跨时间、跨基准比较AI模型能力的方法。
AI.method: 构建了一个统计框架，将不同基准测试"缝合"在一起，将模型能力和基准难度放在单一数值尺度上，类似于"罗塞塔石碑"。该方法不假设能力随时间或训练计算量的演变方式。
AI.result: 框架成功实现了三个应用：1) 测量AI进展速度并预测未来能力；2) 估算算法效率改进率，发现高于但基本符合先前工作的估计；3) 能够检测AI进展的快速加速。
AI.conclusion: 该统计框架为解决AI基准测试快速饱和问题提供了有效方案，能够跨时间、跨基准比较AI模型，为研究长期AI能力趋势和进展预测提供了新工具。

title: Qualitatively distinct mechanisms of noise-induced escape in diffusively coupled bistable elements
summary: The analysis of noise-induced escape in ensembles of bistable elements is challenging, because nonlinearity, coupling, and noise all play essential roles. We show that the interplay of these three factors yields three qualitatively distinct escape mechanisms in diffusively coupled bistable elements, depending on the coupling strength. To clarify the relation between coupling strength and mean escape time, we derive effective one-dimensional dynamics: nonlinear mean-field Fokker-Planck equation in the weak-coupling regime, stochastic mean-field dynamics in the strong-coupling regime, and deterministic mean-field dynamics in the intermediate regime. We validate these reduced descriptions by comparing predictions with numerical simulations. We identify a distinct dominant driving factor of escape processes in each regime. Notably, the three escape mechanisms emerge through the interplay of nonlinearity, diffusive coupling, and dynamical noise -- rather than bifurcations of the noise-free system. Our approach serves as a framework applicable to other diffusively coupled stochastic nonlinear systems, motivating a further search for similar synergistic phenomena.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了扩散耦合双稳态系统中噪声诱导逃逸的三种不同机制，这些机制由耦合强度决定，而非无噪声系统的分岔。
AI.motivation: 分析双稳态元素集合中的噪声诱导逃逸具有挑战性，因为非线性、耦合和噪声都起着重要作用。需要理解这三种因素如何相互作用产生不同的逃逸机制。
AI.method: 推导了三种耦合强度下的有效一维动力学：弱耦合下的非线性平均场Fokker-Planck方程、强耦合下的随机平均场动力学、以及中间耦合下的确定性平均场动力学。通过数值模拟验证这些简化描述。
AI.result: 识别了三种不同的逃逸机制，每种机制对应不同的主导驱动因素。这些机制源于非线性、扩散耦合和动态噪声的相互作用，而非无噪声系统的分岔。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为其他扩散耦合随机非线性系统提供了一个框架，激励进一步寻找类似的协同现象。

title: Orion-Bix: Bi-Axial Attention for Tabular In-Context Learning
summary: Tabular data drive most real-world machine learning applications, yet building general-purpose models for them remains difficult. Mixed numeric and categorical fields, weak feature structure, and limited labeled data make scaling and generalization challenging. To this end, we introduce Orion-Bix, a tabular foundation model that combines biaxial attention with meta-learned in-context reasoning for few-shot tabular learning. Its encoder alternates standard, grouped, hierarchical, and relational attention, fusing their outputs through multi-CLS summarization to capture both local and global dependencies efficiently. A label-aware ICL head adapts on the fly and scales to large label spaces via hierarchical decision routing. Meta-trained on synthetically generated, structurally diverse tables with causal priors, Orion-Bix learns transferable inductive biases across heterogeneous data. Delivered as a scikit-learn compatible foundation model, it outperforms gradient-boosting baselines and remains competitive with state-of-the-art tabular foundation models on public benchmarks, showing that biaxial attention with episodic meta-training enables robust, few-shot-ready tabular learning. The model is publicly available at https://github.com/Lexsi-Labs/Orion-BiX .

AI.tldr: Orion-Bix是一个表格基础模型，通过双轴注意力机制和元学习上下文推理实现少样本表格学习，在公开基准测试中表现优于梯度提升基线方法。
AI.motivation: 表格数据在现实世界机器学习应用中普遍存在，但构建通用模型面临挑战：混合数值和分类特征、弱特征结构、有限标注数据，使得扩展和泛化困难。
AI.method: 结合双轴注意力与元学习上下文推理：编码器交替使用标准、分组、分层和关系注意力，通过多CLS汇总融合输出；标签感知ICL头通过分层决策路由实现动态适应；在具有因果先验的合成生成多样化表格上进行元训练。
AI.result: 在公开基准测试中优于梯度提升基线方法，与最先进的表格基础模型保持竞争力，证明双轴注意力与情景元训练能够实现鲁棒的少样本表格学习。
AI.conclusion: Orion-Bix作为一个scikit-learn兼容的基础模型，通过双轴注意力机制和元学习上下文推理，成功解决了表格数据少样本学习的挑战，实现了跨异构数据的可迁移归纳偏置学习。

title: Precise computation of universal corner entanglement entropy at 2+1 dimension: From Ising to Gaussian quantum critical points
summary: Computing the subleading logarithmic term in the entanglement entropy (EE) of (2+1)d quantum many-body systems remains a significant challenge, despite its critical role in revealing universal information about quantum states and quantum critical points (QCPs). Capitalizing on recent algorithmic advances that enable the stable calculation of EE as an exponential observable, we develop a {\it bubble basis} projector quantum Monte Carlo (QMC) algorithm to precisely and efficiently compute the universal corner EE along a parameter trajectory connecting the Ising and Gaussian QCPs; where in the latter case there exists an analytic value to benchmark with. Our approach eliminates the dominant area-law term directly within the QMC sampling, thereby promoting the coveted subleading logarithmic term to the leading contribution. We apply this technique to calculate the EE in a (2+1)d square-lattice transverse-field Ising model augmented with a four-body interaction, tracing a path from the Ising to the Gaussian QCPs and then to the first-order transition. The consistent values obtained for the universal corner EE along the path validate the reliability and precision of our approach for extracting challenging entanglement properties. These results establish the long-sought connection between the universal values of an exactly solvable limit and those of a strongly correlated regime at (2+1)d.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种基于气泡基投影量子蒙特卡洛的新算法，用于精确计算(2+1)维量子多体系统中纠缠熵的次领头对数项，特别是在Ising和Gaussian量子临界点之间的路径上。
AI.motivation: 尽管纠缠熵的次领头对数项对于揭示量子态和量子临界点的普适信息至关重要，但计算(2+1)维量子多体系统中的这一项仍然是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 利用最近能够稳定计算纠缠熵作为指数可观测量算法的进展，开发了气泡基投影量子蒙特卡洛算法。该方法在QMC采样中直接消除主导的面积律项，使次领头对数项成为主要贡献。
AI.result: 将该技术应用于计算(2+1)维正方晶格横向场Ising模型（添加四体相互作用）中的纠缠熵，追踪从Ising到Gaussian量子临界点再到一级相变的路径。沿路径获得的普适角纠缠熵一致值验证了该方法的可靠性和精确性。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果建立了长期以来寻求的精确可解极限与(2+1)维强关联区域之间普适值的联系，为提取具有挑战性的纠缠性质提供了可靠方法。

title: Reasoning Under Pressure: How do Training Incentives Influence Chain-of-Thought Monitorability?
summary: AI systems that output their reasoning in natural language offer an opportunity for safety -- we can \emph{monitor} their chain of thought (CoT) for undesirable reasoning, such as the pursuit of harmful objectives. However, the extent to which CoT faithfully reflects the underlying reasoning process, and hence the extent to which it can be usefully monitored, may be influenced by certain aspects of training. We investigate how different \emph{training incentives}, applied to a reasoning model, affect its monitorability. We introduce a novel methodology for measuring monitorability according to whether a monitor can predict a key latent variable using the model's reasoning. When controlling for accuracy, we do not find evidence for consistent effects from commonly used incentives (length penalties and KL regularisation), but we find that adversarial optimisation (penalising monitor accuracy) degrades monitor performance, while direct optimisation for monitorability does not reliably lead to improvements. Our code is available at https://github.com/QiyaoWei/reasoning-under-pressure.

AI.tldr: 研究不同训练激励对AI推理模型可监控性的影响，发现对抗性优化会降低监控性能，而直接优化可监控性并不能可靠提升监控效果
AI.motivation: AI系统输出自然语言推理过程为安全监控提供了机会，但推理过程是否忠实反映底层思维过程可能受训练方式影响，需要研究不同训练激励如何影响模型的可监控性
AI.method: 引入新的方法论，通过监控器是否能使用模型的推理预测关键潜在变量来衡量可监控性；研究不同训练激励（长度惩罚、KL正则化、对抗性优化、直接优化可监控性）对监控性能的影响
AI.result: 在控制准确性的情况下，常见激励（长度惩罚和KL正则化）没有一致影响；对抗性优化会降低监控性能；直接优化可监控性并不能可靠地带来改进
AI.conclusion: 训练激励对AI推理模型的可监控性有重要影响，对抗性优化会损害监控能力，而直接优化可监控性并非可靠改进方法，这对AI安全监控策略有重要启示

authors: Jose Luis Lima de Jesus Silva
Paulo Roberto de Melo Barros Junior
title: Hybrid Context-Fusion Attention (CFA) U-Net and Clustering for Robust Seismic Horizon Interpretation
summary: Interpreting seismic horizons is a critical task for characterizing subsurface structures in hydrocarbon exploration. Recent advances in deep learning, particularly U-Net-based architectures, have significantly improved automated horizon tracking. However, challenges remain in accurately segmenting complex geological features and interpolating horizons from sparse annotations. To address these issues, a hybrid framework is presented that integrates advanced U-Net variants with spatial clustering to enhance horizon continuity and geometric fidelity. The core contribution is the Context Fusion Attention (CFA) U-Net, a novel architecture that fuses spatial and Sobel-derived geometric features within attention gates to improve both precision and surface completeness. The performance of five architectures, the U-Net (Standard and compressed), U-Net++, Attention U-Net, and CFA U-Net, was systematically evaluated across various data sparsity regimes (10-, 20-, and 40-line spacing). This approach outperformed existing baselines, achieving state-of-the-art results on the Mexilhao field (Santos Basin, Brazil) dataset with a validation IoU of 0.881 and MAE of 2.49ms, and excellent surface coverage of 97.6% on the F3 Block of the North Sea dataset under sparse conditions. The framework further refines merged horizon predictions (inline and cross-line) using Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise (DBSCAN) to produce geologically plausible surfaces. The results demonstrate the advantages of hybrid methodologies and attention-based architectures enhanced with geometric context, providing a robust and generalizable solution for seismic interpretation in structurally complex and data-scarce environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于地震层位解释的混合框架，结合了改进的U-Net架构和空间聚类技术，在稀疏标注条件下实现了高精度的层位追踪。
AI.motivation: 地震层位解释对油气勘探至关重要，但现有深度学习方法在处理复杂地质特征和稀疏标注时仍面临挑战，需要提高层位连续性和几何保真度。
AI.method: 提出了Context Fusion Attention (CFA) U-Net架构，融合空间和Sobel几何特征于注意力门中；评估了五种架构（标准U-Net、压缩U-Net、U-Net++、Attention U-Net和CFA U-Net）；使用DBSCAN聚类优化层位预测；在不同数据稀疏度（10、20、40线间距）下进行系统评估。
AI.result: 在墨西哥利昂油田数据集上获得验证IoU 0.881和MAE 2.49ms的最佳性能；在北海F3区块稀疏条件下实现97.6%的表面覆盖率；通过DBSCAN聚类生成地质上合理的层位表面。
AI.conclusion: 混合方法和基于几何上下文增强的注意力架构为结构复杂和数据稀缺环境中的地震解释提供了鲁棒且可推广的解决方案，展示了融合几何特征的注意力机制在提升层位追踪精度和连续性方面的优势。

title: Altermagnetic boosting of chiral phonons
summary: Chirality characterizes the asymmetry between a structure and its mirror image and underlies a wide range of chiral functionalities. In crystallographically chiral materials, phonons with non-zero linear momentum $\textbf{k}$ can acquire a $k$-induced longitudinal magnetization, giving rise to chiral phonons. Helical spin order, with its proper screw-type configuration, breaks all mirror symmetries and therefore carries magnetic chirality. Such helical spins also generate non-relativistic spin splitting for any quasiparticle excitations propagating along the screw axis. To explore the possible connection between chiral phonons and magnetic chirality, we investigated the crystallographically polar and chiral compound (Mn,Ni)$_3$TeO$_6$, which hosts three distinct states: a paramagnetic state, a helical spin state with magnetic chirality, and a collinear spin state without magnetic chirality. We find an approximately tenfold enhancement of chiral-phonon coupling in the helical spin state along the screw axis, compared with both the paramagnetic and collinear spin states. These results identify a new route to amplify chiral phonons through an altermagnetic effect arising from the broken parity-time symmetry in helical spins. %from non-relativistic spin splitting.

AI.tldr: 研究发现螺旋自旋态中手性声子耦合增强约10倍，揭示了通过螺旋自旋的宇称-时间对称性破缺放大手性声子的新途径。
AI.motivation: 探索手性声子与磁性手性之间的可能联系，特别是螺旋自旋序如何影响手性声子耦合。
AI.method: 研究具有晶体极性和手性的化合物(Mn,Ni)₃TeO₆，该材料具有三种不同状态：顺磁态、具有磁性手性的螺旋自旋态以及无磁性手性的共线自旋态。
AI.result: 在螺旋自旋态中，沿螺旋轴方向的手性声子耦合比顺磁态和共线自旋态增强了约10倍。
AI.conclusion: 螺旋自旋的宇称-时间对称性破缺产生的交变磁效应为放大手性声子提供了新途径。

title: Four-body interactions in Kerr parametric oscillator circuits
summary: We theoretically present new unit circuits of Kerr parametric oscillators (KPOs) with four-body interactions, which enable the scalable embedding of all-to-all connected logical Ising spins using the Lechner-Hauke-Zoller (LHZ) scheme. These unit circuits enable four-body interactions using linear couplers, making the circuit fabrication and characterization much simpler than those of conventional unit circuits with nonlinear couplers. Numerical calculations indicate that the magnitudes of the coupling constants can be comparable to those in conventional circuits. On the basis of this theory, we designed a four-KPO circuit and experimentally confirmed the four-body correlation by measuring the pump-phase dependence of the parity of the four-KPO states. We show that the choice of the pump frequencies are important not only to enable the four-body interaction, but to cancel the effects of other unwanted interactions. Using the circuit, we demonstrated the quantum annealing based on the LHZ scheme, where the strength of the interaction between the logical Ising spins is mapped to the local field and controlled by a coherent drive applied to each KPO.

AI.tldr: 提出基于Kerr参量振荡器的新型四体相互作用单元电路，采用LHZ方案实现全连接逻辑Ising自旋的可扩展嵌入，并通过实验验证了四体相关性和量子退火演示。
AI.motivation: 传统使用非线性耦合器的KPO单元电路制造和表征复杂，需要开发更简单的电路结构来实现四体相互作用，以便在LHZ方案中实现全连接逻辑Ising自旋的可扩展嵌入。
AI.method: 设计新型KPO单元电路，采用线性耦合器实现四体相互作用；通过数值计算验证耦合常数强度；设计四KPO电路并实验测量四体相关性；通过泵浦频率选择来消除不想要的相互作用；基于LHZ方案实现量子退火。
AI.result: 新型电路制造和表征比传统电路简单；数值计算显示耦合常数强度与传统电路相当；实验成功验证了四体相关性；通过泵浦频率选择有效消除了不想要的相互作用；成功演示了基于LHZ方案的量子退火。
AI.conclusion: 提出的新型KPO单元电路能够简化制造过程，有效实现四体相互作用，为基于LHZ方案的全连接逻辑Ising自旋系统提供了可行的实现途径，并成功演示了量子退火应用。

title: Scaling of a Mutual-Information Distance in One-dimensional Quantum Spin Chains
comment: 5 pages, 2 figures. Companion to arXiv:2507.09749; DMRG and exact XX-chain calculations on one-dimensional quantum spin chains. Code and data available at Zenodo (doi: 10.5281/zenodo.17727059)
summary: We introduce a geometric scaling relation that characterizes the local scale behavior of correlations using the informational distance $d_E = K_0/\sqrt{I}$, where $I$ is the mutual information. We define a geometric conversion factor, $G \equiv \partial_r d_E$, which quantifies the local scale. We show that $G$ relates directly to $I$ via $G \propto I^κ$. For systems with power-law correlations $I(r) \sim r^{-X}$, the metric scaling exponent is $κ= 1/X - 1/2$. A key consequence is that the geometric scale $G$ is uniform (position-independent) if and only if $κ= 0$, which occurs precisely at $X = 2$. This identifies $X = 2$ as the unique condition for a uniform and metric informational distance. We validate this relation using DMRG simulations of the 1D XXZ chain and exact results for the XX model. We demonstrate two falsifiable diagnostics: (i) $G(r)$ is flat in the bulk at criticality ($X \approx 2$) but varies strongly when gapped; (ii) a coordinate-agnostic slope test of $\log G$ versus $\log I$ at the XX benchmark ($X = 2$) yields $κ\simeq 0$. This approach provides a coordinate-independent method for identifying scaling regimes that helps to reduce ambiguity from non-universal amplitudes and from the fitting choices in standard power-law analyses, and defines a simple post-processing pipeline that can be applied directly to numerical or experimental mutual-information data.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于互信息的几何标度关系，通过定义几何转换因子G来量化局部尺度行为，并建立了G与互信息I的幂律关系，为识别标度体系提供了坐标无关的方法。
AI.motivation: 传统幂律分析中存在非普适振幅和拟合选择带来的模糊性，需要一种坐标无关的方法来识别标度体系并减少这些不确定性。
AI.method: 引入几何标度关系，定义信息距离d_E = K_0/√I和几何转换因子G ≡ ∂_r d_E，建立G ∝ I^κ的关系。通过DMRG模拟1D XXZ链和XX模型的精确结果进行验证。
AI.result: 对于幂律相关系统I(r) ∼ r^{-X}，度量标度指数κ = 1/X - 1/2。几何尺度G均匀（位置无关）当且仅当κ = 0，这发生在X = 2时。验证显示：1）在临界点（X≈2）时G(r)平坦，但在能隙态时变化强烈；2）在XX基准（X=2）下，logG与logI的斜率测试得到κ≈0。
AI.conclusion: 该方法提供了一种坐标无关的标度体系识别方法，减少了传统幂律分析中的模糊性，定义了一个可直接应用于数值或实验互信息数据的简单后处理流程。

title: Trification: A Comprehensive Tree-based Strategy Planner and Structural Verification for Fact-Checking
summary: Technological advancement allows information to be shared in just a single click, which has enabled the rapid spread of false information. This makes automated fact-checking system necessary to ensure the safety and integrity of our online media ecosystem. Previous methods have demonstrated the effectiveness of decomposing the claim into simpler sub-tasks and utilizing LLM-based multi agent system to execute them. However, those models faces two limitations: they often fail to verify every component in the claim and lack of structured framework to logically connect the results of sub-tasks for a final prediction. In this work, we propose a novel automated fact-checking framework called Trification. Our framework begins by generating a comprehensive set of verification actions to ensure complete coverage of the claim. It then structured these actions into a dependency graph to model the logical interaction between actions. Furthermore, the graph can be dynamically modified, allowing the system to adapt its verification strategy. Experimental results on two challenging benchmarks demonstrate that our framework significantly enhances fact-checking accuracy, thereby advancing current state-of-the-art in automated fact-checking system.

AI.tldr: 提出Trification框架，通过生成全面验证动作并构建依赖图来提升自动事实核查的准确性和逻辑性
AI.motivation: 现有自动事实核查系统存在两个主要问题：1）无法全面验证声明的每个组成部分；2）缺乏结构化框架来逻辑连接子任务结果。随着虚假信息快速传播，需要更有效的自动化事实核查系统来维护在线媒体生态系统的安全性和完整性。
AI.method: 提出Trification框架：1）生成全面的验证动作集以确保对声明的完整覆盖；2）将这些动作组织成依赖图以建模动作间的逻辑交互；3）支持动态修改图结构，使系统能够自适应调整验证策略。
AI.result: 在两个具有挑战性的基准测试上的实验结果表明，该框架显著提高了事实核查的准确性，从而推进了自动事实核查系统的当前最先进水平。
AI.conclusion: Trification框架通过结构化验证动作和依赖图建模，解决了现有事实核查系统的局限性，为自动事实核查提供了更有效的方法。

title: Near-flat-band-driven violation of Pauli limit in heavy fermion superconductors
summary: Heavy-fermion superconductors often display upper critical fields that exceed the conventional Pauli paramagnetic limit, indicating that strong correlations and hybridized quasiparticle bands play an essential role in the paramagnetic pair-breaking process. Within the two-dimensional Kondo-Heisenberg model, we perform a self-consistent mean-field analysis of spin-singlet s-, extended-s-, and d-wave pairing under Zeeman fields, and compute the critical field Bc, the transition temperature Tc, and the Clogston-Chandrasekhar ratio rCC. We find that rCC increases sharply as the conduction filling approaches half filling. This enhancement arises from the weakly dispersive region of the lower hybridized band, where the strongly reduced Fermi velocity diminishes the normal-state paramagnetic energy and stabilizes superconductivity. At fixed filling, the distinct JH dependences among the three pairing channels reflect the sensitivity of Pauli limiting to both band curvature and the structure of the order parameter. These results provide microscopic evidence that proximity to a near-flat hybridized band offers a robust route to enhanced Pauli-limiting fields in heavy-fermion superconductors.

AI.tldr: 重费米子超导体中，上临界场常超过传统泡利顺磁极限，表明强关联和杂化准粒子带在顺磁配对破坏过程中起关键作用。通过二维Kondo-Heisenberg模型的自洽平均场分析，发现接近半填充时Clogston-Chandrasekhar比急剧增加，这是由于下杂化带的弱色散区域降低了费米速度，从而增强了泡利极限场。
AI.motivation: 研究重费米子超导体中上临界场超过传统泡利顺磁极限的物理机制，探索强关联系统中顺磁配对破坏过程的基本原理。
AI.method: 采用二维Kondo-Heisenberg模型，对自旋单重态s波、扩展s波和d波配对在塞曼场下进行自洽平均场分析，计算临界场Bc、转变温度Tc和Clogston-Chandrasekhar比rCC。
AI.result: 发现rCC在传导电子填充接近半填充时急剧增加；这种增强源于下杂化带的弱色散区域，其中显著降低的费米速度减小了正常态顺磁能，稳定了超导性；不同配对通道对JH的依赖性反映了泡利极限对带曲率和序参数结构的敏感性。
AI.conclusion: 接近近平坦杂化带为重费米子超导体中增强泡利极限场提供了稳健途径，为理解强关联超导体的异常上临界场行为提供了微观证据。

title: Out-of-time correlation functions in single-body systems
summary: In the study of quantum chaos, `out of time ordered correlators' (OTOCs) are commonly used to quantify the rate at which quantum information is scrambled. This rate has been conjectured by Maldecena et al. to obey a universal, temperature dependent bound. Recent studies have shown that instantons, delocalised structures that dominate tunnelling statistics over barriers, reduce the growth rate of OTOCs. For the case of the symmetric double well, this reduction ensures the bound is maintained for OTOCs generated using ring polymer molecular dynamics (RPMD), a method with approximate dynamics but exact quantum statistics. In this report we set out to further understand the role of the instanton in the enforcement of the Maldacena bound and test whether RPMD is sufficient to satisfy the bound. We also investigate the impact of coherence on the flattening of of OTOCs by contrasting bounded with scattering systems. For the scattering system we observe a significantly smaller OTOC growth rate than that of the analogous bounded system, and a flattening in growth rate as time progresses. We attribute the first effect to influence of the Boltzmann operator, and the second to interference caused by anharmonicity of the potential. In our studies of RPMD, we find counterexamples showing that it is not sufficient to satisfy the bound. We develop a theory for OTOCs using (analytically-continued) Matsubara dynamics, revealing significantly different dynamical behaviour around the instanton compared to the predictions of RPMD. The instanton is found to be stationary in all coordinates but its collective angle $Φ_0$, and fluctuations about it no longer resemble that of classical dynamics on a first order saddle as in RPMD.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了量子混沌中OTOCs的增长率，特别是瞬子如何影响Maldacena界限的满足，并测试了RPMD方法是否足以维持该界限。研究发现RPMD存在反例，且瞬子在Matsubara动力学中表现出与RPMD预测不同的行为。
AI.motivation: 研究量子混沌中OTOCs增长率的Maldacena界限，理解瞬子在维持该界限中的作用，并测试RPMD方法是否足以满足该界限。同时探究相干性对OTOCs平坦化的影响，对比有界系统与散射系统的差异。
AI.method: 使用环聚合物分子动力学(RPMD)方法，并基于解析延拓的Matsubara动力学理论分析OTOCs。对比有界系统（对称双势阱）与散射系统，研究瞬子对OTOCs增长率的影响。通过理论分析和数值计算验证RPMD是否满足Maldacena界限。
AI.result: 1. 瞬子降低了OTOCs的增长率，有助于维持Maldacena界限；2. 发现RPMD存在反例，不足以满足该界限；3. 散射系统的OTOCs增长率显著低于类似的有界系统，且随时间推移趋于平坦；4. 基于Matsubara动力学的理论揭示了瞬子周围与RPMD预测显著不同的动力学行为；5. 瞬子在除集体角度Φ₀外的所有坐标中都是静止的，其涨落不再像RPMD中那样类似于经典鞍点动力学。
AI.conclusion: 瞬子在维持OTOCs的Maldacena界限中起关键作用，但RPMD方法本身不足以确保该界限的满足。散射系统与有界系统在OTOCs行为上存在显著差异，这归因于玻尔兹曼算子的影响和势能非谐性引起的干涉效应。Matsubara动力学理论为理解瞬子周围的量子动力学提供了新视角。

title: A mean-field theory of effective normal modes in the Fermi-Pasta-Ulam-Tsingou model
summary: We present a non-perturbative, mean-field theory for the Fermi-Pasta-Ulam-Tsingou model with quartic interaction, capturing the quasiperiodic features shown by the system at all energies in the thermodynamic limit. Starting from the true Hamiltonian $H$ of the system with $N$ degrees of freedom, we introduce a mean-field Hamiltonian $\mathcal{H}$ such that the difference $h_N=(H-\mathcal{H})/N$, considered as a random variable with respect to the Gibbs measure, tends to zero as $N\to\infty$, in probabilistic sense. The dynamics of the mean-field Hamiltonian $\mathcal{H}$ consists of $N$ independent oscillation modes with renormalized frequencies $Ω_k = ω_k\sqrt{1+γ(\varepsilon)}$, $ω_k$ being the frequency of the $k$-th normal mode of the linearized system, whereas $γ(\varepsilon)$ is an explicit function of the specific energy $\varepsilon$ of the system. Analytical predictions drawn from the effective Langevin equations ruling the dynamics of such oscillation modes are successfully compared with the numerical data from the original Hamiltonian dynamics. Such a simple decomposition of the true dynamics into $N$ effective normal modes holds at all energy scales, i.e. from the quasi-integrable regime to the strongly chaotic one.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种用于FPUT模型（四次相互作用）的非微扰平均场理论，在热力学极限下捕捉系统在所有能量尺度上的准周期特征。
AI.motivation: 传统方法难以处理FPUT模型在所有能量尺度（从准可积到强混沌）的非线性动力学行为，需要一种能够统一描述系统从低能到高能区域的理论框架。
AI.method: 从真实哈密顿量H出发，引入平均场哈密顿量ℋ，使得差值h_N=(H-ℋ)/N在概率意义上趋于零。平均场动力学由N个独立振荡模式组成，具有重整化频率Ω_k = ω_k√[1+γ(ε)]，其中γ(ε)是系统比能的显式函数。
AI.result: 理论预测与原始哈密顿动力学的数值数据成功比较，证实了这种简单分解在所有能量尺度上的有效性。有效朗之万方程能够准确描述振荡模式的动力学行为。
AI.conclusion: 该平均场理论为FPUT模型提供了一个统一的非微扰描述框架，能够从准可积区域到强混沌区域一致地捕捉系统的准周期特征，为理解非线性晶格系统的热化行为提供了新视角。

title: ChartPoint: Guiding MLLMs with Grounding Reflection for Chart Reasoning
summary: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have emerged as powerful tools for chart comprehension. However, they heavily rely on extracted content via OCR, which leads to numerical hallucinations when chart textual annotations are sparse. While existing methods focus on scaling instructions, they fail to address the fundamental challenge, i.e., reasoning with visual perception. In this paper, we identify a critical observation: MLLMs exhibit weak grounding in chart elements and proportional relationships, as evidenced by their inability to localize key positions to match their reasoning. To bridge this gap, we propose PointCoT, which integrates reflective interaction into chain-of-thought reasoning in charts. By prompting MLLMs to generate bounding boxes and re-render charts based on location annotations, we establish connections between textual reasoning steps and visual grounding regions. We further introduce an automated pipeline to construct ChartPoint-SFT-62k, a dataset featuring 19.2K high-quality chart samples with step-by-step CoT, bounding box, and re-rendered visualizations. Leveraging this data, we develop two instruction-tuned models, ChartPointQ2 and ChartPointQ2.5, which outperform state-of-the-art across several chart benchmarks, e.g., +5.04\% on ChartBench.

AI.tldr: PointCoT通过结合视觉定位与思维链推理，解决MLLMs在图表理解中的数值幻觉问题，在ChartBench上提升5.04%
AI.motivation: 现有MLLMs依赖OCR提取内容，在图表文本标注稀疏时会产生数值幻觉。现有方法专注于扩展指令，但未能解决视觉感知推理的根本挑战。研究发现MLLMs在图表元素和比例关系上定位能力弱，无法将关键位置与其推理相匹配。
AI.method: 提出PointCoT方法，将反射式交互集成到图表思维链推理中。通过提示MLLMs生成边界框和基于位置标注重新渲染图表，建立文本推理步骤与视觉定位区域之间的联系。构建ChartPoint-SFT-62k数据集，包含19.2K高质量图表样本，带有逐步思维链、边界框和重新渲染的可视化。基于此数据开发两个指令调优模型ChartPointQ2和ChartPointQ2.5。
AI.result: 开发的ChartPointQ2和ChartPointQ2.5模型在多个图表基准测试中优于最先进方法，如在ChartBench上提升5.04%。
AI.conclusion: PointCoT通过将视觉定位与思维链推理相结合，有效解决了MLLMs在图表理解中的数值幻觉问题，显著提升了图表理解性能。

title: Constructing Efficient Fact-Storing MLPs for Transformers
summary: The success of large language models (LLMs) can be attributed in part to their ability to efficiently store factual knowledge as key-value mappings within their MLP parameters. Recent work has proposed explicit weight constructions to build such fact-storing MLPs, providing an improved understanding of LLM fact storage mechanisms. In this paper, we introduce an MLP construction framework that improves over previous constructions in three areas: it 1) works for all but a measure-zero set of feasible input-output pairs, 2) achieves asymptotically optimal parameter efficiency matching information-theoretic bounds for some embeddings, and 3) maintains usability within Transformers for factual recall. Through our improvements, we 1) discover a metric on value embeddings that characterizes facts-per-parameter scaling for both constructed and gradient-descent-trained MLPs, 2) identify a simple encoder-decoder mechanism that empirically matches gradient-descent MLP facts-per-parameter asymptotics across all the inputs and outputs we test, and 3) uncover a fundamental tradeoff between an MLP's fact-storage capacity and its usability within Transformers. Finally, we demonstrate a proof-of-concept application of fact-storing MLPs: modular fact editing on one-layer Transformers by \textit{replacing entire MLPs at once}.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种改进的MLP构建框架，用于在大语言模型中高效存储事实知识作为键值映射，相比之前的方法在通用性、参数效率和Transformer兼容性方面都有提升。
AI.motivation: 大语言模型成功的关键在于其能够将事实知识作为键值映射高效存储在MLP参数中。现有研究提出了显式权重构建方法来构建这种事实存储MLP，但需要进一步改进以更好地理解LLM事实存储机制。
AI.method: 引入一个MLP构建框架，该框架：1) 适用于几乎所有可行的输入-输出对；2) 在某些嵌入情况下达到渐近最优参数效率，匹配信息论界限；3) 保持Transformer内部的事实回忆可用性。
AI.result: 通过改进发现：1) 值嵌入的度量特征化构造和梯度下降训练MLP的事实-参数缩放；2) 识别出简单编码器-解码器机制，经验上匹配梯度下降MLP在所有测试输入输出中的事实-参数渐近特性；3) 揭示MLP事实存储容量与其在Transformer中可用性之间的基本权衡。
AI.conclusion: 该MLP构建框架不仅改进了事实存储机制的理解，还展示了实际应用：通过一次性替换整个MLP来实现单层Transformer上的模块化事实编辑。

title: A Concatenated Dual Displacement Code for Continuous-Variable Quantum Error Correction
summary: The continuous-variable (CV) Gaussian no-go theorem fundamentally limits the suppression of Gaussian displacement errors using only Gaussian gates and states. Prior studies have employed Gottesman-Kitaev-Preskill (GKP) states as ancillary qumodes to suppress small Gaussian displacement errors, but when the displacement magnitude becomes large, lattice-crossing events arise beyond the correctable range of the GKP state. To address this issue, we concatenate a Gaussian-noise-suppression circuit with an outer analog Steane code that corrects such occasional lattice-crossing events as well as other abrupt displacement errors. Unlike conventional concatenation, which primarily aims to reduce logical error rates, the Steane-GKP duality in encoding provides complementary protection against both large and small displacement errors, enabling CV error correction within the continuous encoding space and contrasting with earlier approaches that concatenate GKP states with repetition codes for discrete qubit or qudit encodings. Analytical results show that, under infinite squeezing, the concatenated code suppresses the variance of Gaussian displacement errors across all qumodes by up to 50 percent while enabling unbiased correction of lattice-crossing events, with a success probability determined by the ratio between the residual Gaussian error standard deviation and the lattice-crossing magnitude. Even with finite squeezing, the proposed architecture continues to provide Gaussian-error suppression together with lattice-crossing correction, and the presence of the outer analog Steane code relaxes the squeezing requirement of the inner GKP states, indicating near-term experimental feasibility. This work establishes a viable route toward fault-tolerant continuous-variable quantum computation and provides new insight into the design of concatenated CV error-correcting architectures.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种结合高斯噪声抑制电路和外层模拟Steane码的连续变量量子纠错架构，用于同时抑制高斯位移误差和纠正晶格穿越事件，为容错连续变量量子计算提供了新途径。
AI.motivation: 连续变量高斯不可行定理限制了仅使用高斯门和状态来抑制高斯位移误差的能力。虽然先前研究使用GKP态作为辅助量子模式来抑制小的高斯位移误差，但当位移幅度变大时，会出现超出GKP态可纠正范围的晶格穿越事件。需要一种能同时处理大小位移误差的纠错方案。
AI.method: 将高斯噪声抑制电路与外部模拟Steane码级联。Steane-GKP编码对偶性提供了互补保护：内部GKP态抑制小的高斯位移误差，外部模拟Steane码纠正偶尔发生的晶格穿越事件和其他突发位移误差。这种架构在连续编码空间内工作，不同于以往将GKP态与重复码级联用于离散量子比特或量子比特编码的方法。
AI.result: 在无限压缩条件下，级联编码可将所有量子模式的高斯位移误差方差抑制高达50%，同时实现对晶格穿越事件的无偏纠正。即使在有限压缩条件下，该架构仍能提供高斯误差抑制和晶格穿越纠正，且外部模拟Steane码的存在降低了内部GKP态的压缩要求，增强了实验可行性。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为容错连续变量量子计算建立了一条可行路径，并为设计级联连续变量纠错架构提供了新见解。通过Steane-GKP对偶编码，实现了对大小位移误差的互补保护，在连续编码空间内进行纠错，具有近期的实验可行性。

title: Canonical Distribution of the Occupancy Numbers of Bosonic Systems
summary: The paper works out the canonical probability distribution of the occupancy numbers of a bosonic system and shows that canonical typicality applies to the canonical density operator of the occupancy numbers. The result is that, if, as it is today standard, the canonical system's mixed state is obtained by tracing out the environment from any typical pure state of the universe, then asymptotically the canonical probability distribution of system's occupancy numbers tends in probability to the multinomial distribution. The paper also shows that the currently accepted probability distribution of the occupancy numbers of a system with fixed number of particles is not compatible with the commonly accepted notion of canonical system.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了玻色系统的占据数概率分布满足典型性，当从宇宙的典型纯态中通过迹掉环境得到系统的混合态时，占据数的概率分布渐近地趋向于多项分布。
AI.motivation: 当前关于固定粒子数系统的占据数概率分布与通常接受的规范系统概念不兼容，需要建立与规范典型性一致的占据数概率分布理论。
AI.method: 通过数学推导，从宇宙的典型纯态出发，通过迹掉环境得到系统的混合态，分析占据数的规范概率分布，证明其渐近性质。
AI.result: 玻色系统占据数的规范概率分布满足典型性，渐近地趋向于多项分布，这与当前接受的固定粒子数系统的占据数分布不同。
AI.conclusion: 规范典型性适用于占据数的规范密度算符，当前关于固定粒子数系统的占据数概率分布需要重新审视以与规范系统概念保持一致。

title: Spin-resolved Mott crossover and entanglement in the half-filled Hubbard model
summary: We study interaction-driven crossover from a correlated metallic state to Mott-insulating state on the half-filled 3x3 square cluster using exact diagonalization in the S=1/2 and S=3/2 sectors. Using complementary diagnostics such as order parameters, principal component analysis (PCA) of correlation matrices and quantum geometry, we obtain a unified, data-driven characterization of the crossover. All three diagnostics consistently identify a broad crossover centered in the weak-to-intermediate coupling regime U~2-6; charge gaps open rapidly, double occupancy suppresses, local moments form, entanglement is significantly reduced, PCA concentrates variance into a few dominant modes and the distance matrices reveals rapid wavefunction reorganization. Our multi-pronged approach establishes the Mott crossover as a smooth but well defined reorganization of electronic correlations with pronounced spin-sector dependence in finite systems.

AI.tldr: 通过精确对角化研究3x3方格簇中相互作用驱动的金属-莫特绝缘体交叉，采用多诊断方法统一表征这一平滑但明确的电子关联重组过程。
AI.motivation: 研究相互作用驱动的金属态到莫特绝缘体态的交叉过程，特别是在有限系统中理解电子关联的重组机制和自旋依赖特性。
AI.method: 使用精确对角化方法研究半填充的3x3方格簇，在S=1/2和S=3/2自旋扇区进行分析。采用多种互补诊断工具：序参数、关联矩阵的主成分分析(PCA)、量子几何方法。
AI.result: 所有诊断方法一致识别出在弱到中等耦合区域(U~2-6)存在广泛的交叉：电荷能隙快速打开，双占据被抑制，局域磁矩形成，纠缠显著减少，PCA将方差集中在少数主导模式中，距离矩阵显示波函数快速重组。
AI.conclusion: 莫特交叉是电子关联的平滑但明确的重组过程，在有限系统中表现出显著的自旋扇区依赖性，多诊断方法为这一交叉提供了统一的数据驱动表征。

title: Local distinguishability of five orthogonal product states on bipartite and tripartite quantum systems
summary: Local distinguishability of orthogonal quantum states can effectively reduce the consumption of quantum resources and lower economic costs in quantum protocols. Although numerous achievements have been made regarding local distinguishability of orthogonal quantum states, some fundamental issues have not been effectively addressed. For example, the local distinguishability of five orthogonal product states (OPSs) is still unknown up to now. In this paper, we give the properties of local distinguishability of five OPSs on bipartite and tripartite quantum systems. Firstly, to characterize the structure of a set of bipartite OPSs, we propose the concept of the vector of orthogonal relations for a set of bipartite OPSs. Secondly, we classify the structures of five bipartite OPSs into six categories by this concept and prove that five of these six categories can be perfectly distinguished by local operations and classical communication (LOCC). Thirdly we show that the local distinguishability of each case of the sixth category singly. On the other hand, we first divide the structures of five tripartite OPSs into eight categories by the vectors of orthogonal relations of five tripartite OPSs. Then we give the local distinguishability of each category. Our work enriches the research results of quantum nonlocality and will provide a clear understanding of the local distinguishability of five OPSs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了五正交乘积态（OPSs）的局域可区分性问题，提出了正交关系向量概念来分类结构，并分析了二分和三分量子系统中五OPSs的局域可区分性。
AI.motivation: 尽管正交量子态的局域可区分性研究已有很多成果，但一些基本问题仍未有效解决，特别是五正交乘积态的局域可区分性至今未知。本研究旨在填补这一空白，丰富量子非局域性研究成果。
AI.method: 1. 提出二分OPSs的正交关系向量概念来表征结构；2. 将五二分OPSs结构分为六类，证明其中五类可通过LOCC完美区分；3. 分析第六类中每个情况的局域可区分性；4. 将五三分OPSs结构分为八类，并给出每类的局域可区分性。
AI.result: 1. 五二分OPSs的六类结构中，前五类可通过LOCC完美区分；2. 第六类需要单独分析每个情况的局域可区分性；3. 五三分OPSs的八类结构都给出了相应的局域可区分性结果。
AI.conclusion: 本研究系统地解决了五正交乘积态的局域可区分性问题，提出了正交关系向量这一有效工具，为理解量子非局域性提供了清晰框架，丰富了该领域的研究成果。

title: Adaptation to time-varying environments in a reaction-diffusion model
summary: We present a spatially-extended system of chemical reactions exhibiting adaptation to time-dependent influxes of reactants. Here adaptation is defined as improved reproductive success, namely the ability of one of the many locally stable states available to the system to expand in space at the expense of other states. We find that adaptation can arise simply by environmental exposure to sequences of varying influxes. This adaptation is specific to the temporal sequence yet flexible enough to generalize to related sequences. It is enhanced through repeated exposure to the same environmental sequence, representing a form of learning, and through spatial interactions, enabling natural selection to act and representing a form of collective learning. Finally, adaptation benefits from a nearby adapted state, representing a form of teacher-guided learning. By combining environmental drives and reproduction within a stochastic reaction-diffusion dynamics framework, our model lays a foundation for a theory of adaptation grounded in physical principles.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一个空间扩展的化学反应系统，能够适应随时间变化的反应物流入。适应被定义为一种局部稳定状态在空间上扩展并取代其他状态的能力，类似于改进的繁殖成功率。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是探索基于物理原理的适应理论，将环境驱动和繁殖结合在随机反应扩散动力学框架中，为理解生物适应现象提供物理基础。
AI.method: 采用空间扩展的化学反应系统，在随机反应扩散动力学框架下，通过环境暴露于不同流入序列来研究适应现象。系统包含多个局部稳定状态，通过空间相互作用和自然选择机制实现适应。
AI.result: 研究发现：1）适应可以通过环境暴露于变化流入序列而产生；2）适应具有序列特异性但能推广到相关序列；3）重复暴露增强适应（学习形式）；4）空间相互作用促进自然选择（集体学习）；5）附近适应状态的存在有助于适应（教师引导学习）。
AI.conclusion: 该模型为基于物理原理的适应理论奠定了基础，展示了环境驱动和繁殖在随机反应扩散系统中如何共同产生适应现象，为理解生物适应提供了新的物理视角。

title: CogEvo-Edu: Cognitive Evolution Educational Multi-Agent Collaborative System
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly deployed as conversational tutors in STEM education, yet most systems still rely on a single LLM with a static retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipeline over course materials. This design struggles in complex domains such as digital signal processing (DSP), where tutors must maintain coherent long-term student models, manage heterogeneous knowledge bases, and adapt teaching strategies over extended interactions. We argue that retrieval, memory, and control should be treated as a coupled cognitive evolution process. We instantiate this view in CogEvo-Edu, a hierarchical educational multi-agent system comprising a Cognitive Perception Layer (CPL), a Knowledge Evolution Layer (KEL), and a Meta-Control Layer (MCL). CPL maintains dual memories and performs confidence-weighted consolidation to build structured, self-correcting student profiles under limited context. KEL assigns each knowledge chunk a spatiotemporal value that drives activation, semantic compression, and forgetting. MCL formulates tutoring as hierarchical sequential decision making, orchestrating specialized agents and jointly adapting CPL/KEL hyperparameters via a dual inner--outer loop. To evaluate CogEvo-Edu, we construct DSP-EduBench, a vertical benchmark for DSP tutoring with heterogeneous resources, simulated student profiles, and long-horizon interaction scripts. Using a three-model LLM-as-a-Judge ensemble, CogEvo-Edu raises the overall score from 5.32 to 9.23 and improves all six indicators over static RAG, simple memory, and a single-agent variant, demonstrating the value of jointly evolving student profiles, knowledge bases, and teaching policies.

AI.tldr: 论文提出CogEvo-Edu系统，通过分层多智能体架构将检索、记忆和控制作为耦合的认知演化过程，显著提升STEM教育中LLM对话导师在复杂领域（如数字信号处理）的教学效果。
AI.motivation: 当前STEM教育中部署的LLM对话导师大多依赖单一模型和静态检索增强生成管道，难以应对复杂领域（如数字信号处理）的挑战：需要维护连贯的长期学生模型、管理异构知识库以及在长期互动中自适应调整教学策略。
AI.method: 提出CogEvo-Edu分层教育多智能体系统，包含三个层次：认知感知层（维护双重记忆并进行置信度加权整合以构建结构化、自校正的学生档案）、知识演化层（为每个知识块分配时空价值以驱动激活、语义压缩和遗忘）、元控制层（将教学制定为分层顺序决策，协调专门智能体并通过双重内外循环联合调整前两层的超参数）。
AI.result: 构建DSP-EduBench垂直基准测试，使用三模型LLM-as-a-Judge集成评估。CogEvo-Edu将总体得分从5.32提升至9.23，在六个指标上均优于静态RAG、简单记忆和单智能体变体，证明了联合演化学生档案、知识库和教学策略的价值。
AI.conclusion: 将检索、记忆和控制视为耦合的认知演化过程是有效的，CogEvo-Edu系统通过分层多智能体架构显著提升了复杂STEM领域（如数字信号处理）中LLM对话导师的教学效果。

title: Self-Supervised Dynamical System Representations for Physiological Time-Series
summary: The effectiveness of self-supervised learning (SSL) for physiological time series depends on the ability of a pretraining objective to preserve information about the underlying physiological state while filtering out unrelated noise. However, existing strategies are limited due to reliance on heuristic principles or poorly constrained generative tasks. To address this limitation, we propose a pretraining framework that exploits the information structure of a dynamical systems generative model across multiple time-series. This framework reveals our key insight that class identity can be efficiently captured by extracting information about the generative variables related to the system parameters shared across similar time series samples, while noise unique to individual samples should be discarded. Building on this insight, we propose PULSE, a cross-reconstruction-based pretraining objective for physiological time series datasets that explicitly extracts system information while discarding non-transferrable sample-specific ones. We establish theory that provides sufficient conditions for the system information to be recovered, and empirically validate it using a synthetic dynamical systems experiment. Furthermore, we apply our method to diverse real-world datasets, demonstrating that PULSE learns representations that can broadly distinguish semantic classes, increase label efficiency, and improve transfer learning.

AI.tldr: 提出PULSE框架，通过跨重建预训练目标从生理时间序列中提取系统参数信息，同时丢弃样本特异性噪声，提升自监督学习效果。
AI.motivation: 现有生理时间序列的自监督学习方法依赖启发式原则或约束不足的生成任务，无法有效分离生理状态信息和噪声，限制了表示学习的效果。
AI.method: 提出PULSE框架，基于动态系统生成模型的信息结构，通过跨重建预训练目标显式提取共享的系统参数信息，同时丢弃样本特异性噪声。
AI.result: 理论分析提供了系统信息可恢复的充分条件，合成动态系统实验验证了理论，真实世界数据集实验表明PULSE能区分语义类别、提高标签效率和改善迁移学习。
AI.conclusion: PULSE框架通过利用动态系统生成模型的信息结构，有效提取生理时间序列中的系统参数信息，为生理时间序列的自监督学习提供了理论基础和实用方法。

title: Quantum Sensing via Large Spin-Clusters in Solid-State NMR: Optimal coherence order for practical sensing
summary: Quantum entanglement has long been recognized as an important resource for quantum sensing. In this work, we demonstrate the use of multiple-quantum solid-state NMR for quantum sensing by creating, manipulating, and detecting large clusters of correlated nuclear spins. We show that such clusters can sensitively detect pulse-width jitters in radio-frequency control fields at the level of tens of nanoseconds. By analyzing the response of high-order quantum coherences to these control-field jitters, we investigate the critical interplay between the enhanced sensitivity offered by large coherence orders, their relative distributions, and their varying susceptibility to decoherence. We further demonstrate that, even within a non-uniform distribution of coherence orders, there exists an optimal maximum coherence order that maximizes sensing efficiency. To support our interpretation, we supplement the experimental results with a simplified numerical model that estimates the corresponding quantum Fisher information. These results support the solid-state NMR platform as a valuable testbed for investigating many-body quantum metrology protocols.

AI.tldr: 该研究利用固态NMR中的多量子相干技术进行量子传感，通过创建、操控和检测大团簇的核自旋关联，实现了对射频控制场脉冲宽度抖动的灵敏检测，并探索了高量子相干阶数在传感中的优化问题。
AI.motivation: 量子纠缠长期以来被认为是量子传感的重要资源。本研究旨在探索固态核磁共振平台作为研究多体量子计量协议的测试平台，特别是利用多量子相干技术来增强传感灵敏度。
AI.method: 采用多量子固态核磁共振技术，创建、操控和检测大团簇的关联核自旋。通过分析高阶量子相干对控制场抖动的响应，研究增强灵敏度与退相干之间的关键相互作用。同时开发简化的数值模型来估计相应的量子费舍尔信息。
AI.result: 实验表明，这种自旋团簇能够灵敏地检测到数十纳秒级别的射频控制场脉冲宽度抖动。研究发现，即使在非均匀的相干阶分布中，也存在一个最优的最大相干阶数，能够最大化传感效率。数值模型结果支持了实验解释。
AI.conclusion: 该研究支持固态核磁共振平台作为研究多体量子计量协议的宝贵测试平台，展示了多量子相干技术在量子传感中的应用潜力，特别是在优化相干阶数分布以提高传感效率方面。

title: Violation of the method of images in non-Markovian processes and its connection to stochastic thermodynamics
summary: We discuss a failure of the wide-spread method of images solution to describe the time evolution of probability distribution in diffusive processes with memory. For a path that touches a target during stochastic evolution, we define its conjugate twin of reflected path, and show that their path probability ratio obeys a relation analogous to the fluctuation theorem. With a key quantity properly identified as the heat, the resultant thermodynamic interpretation of the processes provides a quantitative basis as well as an intuitive physical picture on how and why the method of images breaks down for non-Markovian processes.

AI.tldr: 本文揭示了镜像法在描述具有记忆的扩散过程中概率分布时间演化时的失效，通过定义反射路径的共轭孪生路径，建立了类似涨落定理的路径概率比关系，为理解镜像法在非马尔可夫过程中的失效提供了热力学解释。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是解决广泛使用的镜像法在描述具有记忆的扩散过程中概率分布时间演化时的失效问题。作者发现对于非马尔可夫过程，镜像法无法准确描述概率分布，需要深入理解其失效机制。
AI.method: 方法包括：1）定义在随机演化中触及目标的路径及其反射路径的共轭孪生路径；2）证明这两种路径的概率比服从类似涨落定理的关系；3）将关键物理量识别为热量，从而为过程提供热力学解释。
AI.result: 研究结果表明：1）路径概率比确实服从类似涨落定理的关系；2）通过热力学解释，为镜像法在非马尔可夫过程中的失效提供了定量基础和直观物理图像；3）揭示了镜像法失效的根本原因与过程的记忆特性相关。
AI.conclusion: 结论是镜像法在非马尔可夫扩散过程中会失效，通过建立路径概率比的热力学解释，为理解这种失效提供了理论框架。这项工作不仅解释了为什么镜像法在具有记忆的过程中不适用，还提供了替代的物理图像来理解这类过程的演化。

title: Echo-N1: Affective RL Frontier
summary: The LLM field has spent a year perfecting RL for tasks machines already excel at, math, code, and deterministic reasoning, while completely sidestepping the domain that actually defines human intelligence: subjective, emotionally grounded, personality sensitive conversation. This space has often been regarded as inherently subjective and challenging to formalize, making it appear unsuitable for conventional RL pipelines. We show that it is not only possible and it is a solvable and transformative RL problem. We propose the first framework that infers user personality on the fly and optimizes model behavior toward personalized conversational preferences. Contrary to the widespread belief that RL collapses in non-verifiable settings, our method produces consistent, robust, and dramatic improvements in humanlike interaction quality. We also introduce the first dynamic emotional intelligence evaluation suite to quantify these gains. Our model, which is introduced as Echo-N1, behaves far above its base version and outperforming the proprietary Doubao 1.5 Character. This work establishes a new frontier for RL: optimizing models for the deeply subjective, deeply human dimensions of conversation.

AI.tldr: 论文提出首个基于强化学习的个性化对话框架，通过实时推断用户个性来优化对话行为，在主观情感对话领域取得突破性进展。
AI.motivation: 当前LLM领域过度关注数学、代码等确定性推理任务，而忽略了真正定义人类智能的主观、情感化、个性敏感的对话领域。这一领域常被认为过于主观难以形式化，不适合传统RL方法。
AI.method: 提出首个实时推断用户个性并优化模型行为以适应个性化对话偏好的框架。引入动态情商评估套件来量化改进效果。模型名为Echo-N1。
AI.result: 方法在非可验证环境中产生一致、稳健且显著的类人交互质量改进。Echo-N1表现远超其基础版本，并优于专有模型Doubao 1.5 Character。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为RL开辟了新前沿：为对话中深刻主观、深刻人性化的维度优化模型，证明主观情感对话领域是可解决且具有变革性的RL问题。

title: Evidence for itinerant electron-local moment interaction in Li-doped $α$-MnTe
summary: We use inelastic neutron scattering to study the impact of Li doping on the semiconducting altermagnet $α$-MnTe. Introducing Li results in a spin reorientation from in-plane to out-of-plane and increases the density of itinerant carriers. While the spin waves in Li-doped $α$-MnTe remain largely Heisenberg-like, there is significant spin wave broadening across the entire Brillouin zone, signaling enhanced magnon damping induced by itinerant carriers. By extracting the local dynamic susceptibility and applying the total moment sum rule, we find that both undoped and Li-doped $α$-MnTe exhibit the full expected Mn$^{2+}$ local moment of $\approx5.9~μ_\mathrm{B}$ with $S=5/2$. These results demonstrate that Li-doped $α$-MnTe hosts robust local-moment magnetism whose interactions are mediated via Ruderman-Kittel-Kasuya-Yosida-type interactions, highlighting the importance of itinerant carriers in magneto-transport and spin dynamic properties of altermagnets.

AI.tldr: 通过非弹性中子散射研究Li掺杂对α-MnTe的影响，发现Li掺杂导致自旋重定向（面内→面外），增加载流子密度，引起显著的自旋波展宽，但保持完整的Mn²⁺局域磁矩。
AI.motivation: 研究Li掺杂如何影响α-MnTe这种半导体交变磁体的磁性和自旋动力学性质，探索载流子对交变磁体磁输运和自旋动态特性的重要性。
AI.method: 使用非弹性中子散射技术研究Li掺杂的α-MnTe，提取局域动态磁化率，应用总磁矩求和规则分析磁矩特性。
AI.result: Li掺杂导致自旋重定向从面内转向面外，增加载流子密度，引起整个布里渊区的自旋波展宽（增强的磁振子阻尼），但未掺杂和Li掺杂样品都保持完整的Mn²⁺局域磁矩（≈5.9μ_B，S=5/2）。
AI.conclusion: Li掺杂的α-MnTe具有稳健的局域磁矩磁性，其相互作用通过RKKY型相互作用介导，强调了载流子在交变磁体磁输运和自旋动态特性中的重要性。

title: On the EPR paradox in systems with finite number of levels
summary:
In this work we reexamine the EPR paradox for composite systems with a finite number of levels. The analysis emphasizes the connection between measurements and conditional probabilities. This connection implies, on the one hand, that when a measurement is performed, the new quantum state and the probability distribution becomes a function of the observable being measured. On the other hand, this becomes important when making predictions about the properties of the subsystems, since the predictions are implicitly a function of the observable that was measured.
  Systems with finitely many levels are simpler to describe because the analysis is not encumbered by the mathematical technicalities of the continuous case, and the underlying physical interpretations are the same.

AI.tldr: 重新审视有限能级复合系统的EPR悖论，强调测量与条件概率的联系，指出测量后的量子态和概率分布依赖于所测可观测量，这对子系统性质预测有重要影响。
AI.motivation: 重新审视有限能级复合系统的EPR悖论，因为有限能级系统比连续情况更简单，避免了数学技术复杂性，同时物理解释相同，便于更清晰地分析测量与条件概率的关系。
AI.method: 通过分析有限能级复合系统，强调测量与条件概率之间的连接关系，研究测量如何影响量子态和概率分布，以及这对子系统性质预测的影响。
AI.result: 发现当进行测量时，新的量子态和概率分布成为所测量可观测量的函数；这对子系统性质预测至关重要，因为这些预测隐式地依赖于所测量的可观测量。
AI.conclusion: 有限能级复合系统的EPR悖论分析表明，测量与条件概率的密切联系意味着量子态和概率分布依赖于测量过程，这对理解子系统性质和量子力学基础有重要意义。

title: The stochastic discrete nonlinear Schrödinger equation: microscopic derivation and finite-temperature phase transition
summary: We study a stochastic version of the one-dimensional discrete nonlinear Schr{ö}dinger equation (DNSE), which is derived from first principles, and thus possesses all the properties required by statistical mechanics, such as detailed balance and the H-theorem. The stochastic version shows disordered and localised dynamics, and displays a corresponding phase transition at a finite temperature value. The phase transition can be captured in a quantitative way by a mean-field type approach. The corresponding coarsening dynamics shows an unexpected dependence on the noise strength, which is reminiscent of stochastic resonance. The phase transition is linked with negative temperature phase transitions, which have been reported recently for the Hamiltonian dynamics of the DNSE. Our approach gives a clue to how these negative temperature phase transitions can be implemented in experimental setups, which are inevitably coupled to a positive temperature heat bath.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一维离散非线性薛定谔方程（DNSE）的随机版本，展示了无序局域化动力学、有限温度相变，以及噪声强度对粗化动力学的意外影响。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于理解DNSE的统计力学性质，特别是如何将负温度相变与实验装置中的正温度热浴耦合，为实验实现负温度相变提供线索。
AI.method: 从第一性原理推导出DNSE的随机版本，确保满足统计力学性质（如细致平衡和H定理），并采用平均场类型方法来定量描述相变。
AI.result: 随机版本表现出无序和局域化动力学，在有限温度值处显示相变；粗化动力学对噪声强度有意外依赖，类似于随机共振现象。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为实验实现负温度相变提供了重要线索，揭示了随机DNSE中相变与噪声强度的复杂关系，将负温度相变与正温度热浴耦合的实验设置联系起来。

title: Debate with Images: Detecting Deceptive Behaviors in Multimodal Large Language Models
summary: Are frontier AI systems becoming more capable? Certainly. Yet such progress is not an unalloyed blessing but rather a Trojan horse: behind their performance leaps lie more insidious and destructive safety risks, namely deception. Unlike hallucination, which arises from insufficient capability and leads to mistakes, deception represents a deeper threat in which models deliberately mislead users through complex reasoning and insincere responses. As system capabilities advance, deceptive behaviours have spread from textual to multimodal settings, amplifying their potential harm. First and foremost, how can we monitor these covert multimodal deceptive behaviors? Nevertheless, current research remains almost entirely confined to text, leaving the deceptive risks of multimodal large language models unexplored. In this work, we systematically reveal and quantify multimodal deception risks, introducing MM-DeceptionBench, the first benchmark explicitly designed to evaluate multimodal deception. Covering six categories of deception, MM-DeceptionBench characterizes how models strategically manipulate and mislead through combined visual and textual modalities. On the other hand, multimodal deception evaluation is almost a blind spot in existing methods. Its stealth, compounded by visual-semantic ambiguity and the complexity of cross-modal reasoning, renders action monitoring and chain-of-thought monitoring largely ineffective. To tackle this challenge, we propose debate with images, a novel multi-agent debate monitor framework. By compelling models to ground their claims in visual evidence, this method substantially improves the detectability of deceptive strategies.
