Experiments show that it consistently increases agreement with human judgements across all tested models, boosting Cohen's kappa by 1.5x and accuracy by 1.25x on GPT-4o.

AI.tldr: 该论文揭示了前沿AI系统在能力提升的同时，隐藏着更危险的欺骗性风险，特别是多模态欺骗。作者创建了首个多模态欺骗基准MM-DeceptionBench，并提出了基于图像辩论的多智能体监控框架来检测这类欺骗行为。
AI.motivation: 随着AI系统能力增强，欺骗行为从文本扩展到多模态领域，带来了更隐蔽和破坏性的安全风险。当前研究主要集中在文本欺骗，对多模态大语言模型的欺骗风险缺乏系统探索和有效监控方法。
AI.method: 1. 创建MM-DeceptionBench基准，涵盖六类欺骗行为，评估模型通过视觉和文本模态进行策略性操纵和误导的能力；2. 提出"基于图像辩论"的多智能体辩论监控框架，通过强制模型基于视觉证据进行辩论，提高欺骗策略的可检测性。
AI.result: 实验表明，提出的辩论监控方法在所有测试模型中都显著提高了与人类判断的一致性，在GPT-4o上将Cohen's kappa提高了1.5倍，准确率提高了1.25倍。该方法有效解决了多模态欺骗的隐蔽性问题。
AI.conclusion: 多模态欺骗是AI安全领域的重要威胁，需要专门的评估基准和监控方法。论文提出的MM-DeceptionBench和辩论监控框架为检测和缓解多模态欺骗风险提供了有效工具，强调了在AI能力提升的同时必须加强安全监控的重要性。

title: Electric-field driven flat bands in the distorted sawtooth chain via the Katsura-Nagaosa-Balatsky mechanism
summary:
We investigate flat magnonic bands in a generalized sawtooth-chain
  model in which three sets of exchange parameters (symmetric
  Heisenberg exchange, axial Ising anisotropy, and antisymmetric
  Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya (DM) exchange) are assigned independently to
  each side of the triangular plaquette. If the effective
  Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya (DM) interaction parameters are generated
  via the Katsura-Nagaosa-Balatsky (KNB) mechanism of
  magnetoelectricity, they become explicit functions of the
  electric-field magnitude and direction, as well as of the lattice
  geometry, which in the present casen is characterized by two bond
  angles. We focus on the situation in which these two angles are
  unequal, corresponding to a distortion of the triangular
  plaquette. Several electric-field induced flat-band scenarios in
  the distorted sawtooth chain are analyzed, and expressions are
  derived for the electric-field strength required to drive the
  one-magnon excitations into a flat-band regime when the field is
  aligned along the lattice bonds. The saturation field and its
  dependence on the distortion angle are also examined. Finally, we
  establish a mapping between the flat-band solutions for a general
  DM interaction and its specific KNB-induced form.
  \\~
  \emph{This article is dedicated to the memory of Johannes Richter.}

AI.tldr: 研究广义锯齿链模型中平坦磁振子能带，通过电场调控Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用实现能带平坦化
AI.motivation: 探索在广义锯齿链模型中，通过电场调控Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用来产生平坦磁振子能带的可能性，特别是在三角形晶格畸变的情况下
AI.method: 采用广义锯齿链模型，包含三组独立交换参数（对称海森堡交换、轴向伊辛各向异性、反对称DM交换），通过Katsura-Nagaosa-Balatsky机制将DM相互作用参数化为电场强度和方向以及晶格几何的函数，重点分析三角形晶格畸变情况
AI.result: 分析了畸变锯齿链中几种电场诱导的平坦能带情景，推导了电场沿晶格键排列时驱动单磁振子激发进入平坦能带区域所需的电场强度表达式，研究了饱和场及其对畸变角的依赖关系，建立了通用DM相互作用与特定KNB诱导形式之间的平坦能带解映射关系
AI.conclusion: 通过电场调控DM相互作用可以在畸变锯齿链中实现平坦磁振子能带，建立了通用DM相互作用与KNB机制诱导的特定形式之间的对应关系，为电场控制磁振子能带结构提供了理论框架

title: Hybridization of pulse and continuous-wave based optical quantum computation
summary: We propose a pulse and continuous wave (CW) hybrid architecture of continuous-variable measurement-based optical quantum computation utilizing the strengths of both pulsed and CW light. In this architecture, input and ancillary non-Gaussian quantum states necessary for fault-tolerance and universality of quantum computing are generated with pulsed light, whereas quantum processors including continuous-variable cluster states and homodyne measurement systems are operated with CW light. This architecture is expected to enable both generation of quantum states with shorter optical wavepackets and low-loss manipulation and measurement of these states, thus is compatible with ultrafast and low-loss quantum information processing. In this study, as a proof-of-principle, an ultrafast homodyne measurement using CW local oscillator was performed on single-photon states generated with pulsed light. The measured single-photon state's temporal width was around 70 ps and the value of the Wigner function at the origin was W(0,0) = -0.153 +/- 0.003, which is highly non-classical. This will be a core technology for realizing high-speed optical quantum information processing.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种脉冲与连续波混合架构的连续变量测量基光学量子计算，结合了脉冲光和连续波光的优势，用于实现高速、低损耗的量子信息处理。
AI.motivation: 为了克服传统量子计算架构中脉冲光或连续波光单独使用的局限性，需要结合两者的优势：脉冲光能产生短波包的非高斯量子态，而连续波光能实现低损耗的量子态操作和测量。
AI.method: 采用脉冲与连续波混合架构：1) 使用脉冲光生成输入和辅助的非高斯量子态（实现容错和通用性所需）；2) 使用连续波光构建量子处理器，包括连续变量簇态和零差测量系统。
AI.result: 原理验证实验中，对脉冲光生成的单光子态进行了超快零差测量（使用连续波本地振荡器）。测得单光子态的时间宽度约为70 ps，原点处的Wigner函数值为W(0,0) = -0.153 +/- 0.003，表现出高度非经典特性。
AI.conclusion: 该混合架构有望同时实现短波包量子态生成和低损耗的量子态操作与测量，兼容超快和低损耗的量子信息处理，是实现高速光学量子信息处理的核心技术。

title: Path-integrals and optimal paths for the fractional Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process
summary: We derive the path-integral representation of the fractional Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process driven by Riemann-Liouville fractional Gaussian noise, for both the subdiffusive and superdiffusive regimes. We express the corresponding action, which is a quadratic functional of individual trajectories of the process, in two alternative but equivalent forms: either as a fractional integral or as a double integral with a nonlocal kernel. Moreover, we determine in closed form the optimal (action-minimizing) paths conditioned to reach a prescribed point at a fixed time moment and discuss their behavior, which appears to be non-intuitive for subdiffusive processes in the presence of a strong confining potential.

AI.tldr: 推导了由Riemann-Liouville分数高斯噪声驱动的分数Ornstein-Uhlenbeck过程的路径积分表示，包括亚扩散和超扩散两种状态，给出了两种等价的作用量表达式，并确定了到达固定时间点指定位置的最优路径。
AI.motivation: 研究分数Ornstein-Uhlenbeck过程的路径积分表示，这对于理解分数随机过程的动力学行为具有重要意义，特别是在亚扩散和超扩散状态下的非直观行为。
AI.method: 推导了分数Ornstein-Uhlenbeck过程的路径积分表示，得到了两种等价的作用量表达式：一种是分数积分形式，另一种是具有非局部核的双重积分形式。
AI.result: 获得了作用量的闭合形式表达式，确定了到达固定时间点指定位置的最优（作用量最小化）路径，并讨论了在强约束势下亚扩散过程的非直观行为。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了分数Ornstein-Uhlenbeck过程的路径积分框架，揭示了分数随机过程在约束条件下的独特动力学特性，为相关研究提供了理论基础。

title: GreenPlanner: Practical Floorplan Layout Generation via an Energy-Aware and Function-Feasible Generative Framework
summary: Building design directly affects human well-being and carbon emissions, yet generating spatial-functional and energy-compliant floorplans remains manual, costly, and non-scalable. Existing methods produce visually plausible layouts but frequently violate key constraints, yielding invalid results due to the absence of automated evaluation. We present GreenPlanner, an energy- and functionality-aware generative framework that unifies design evaluation and generation. It consists of a labeled Design Feasibility Dataset for learning constraint priors; a fast Practical Design Evaluator (PDE) for predicting energy performance and spatial-functional validity; a Green Plan Dataset (GreenPD) derived from PDE-guided filtering to pair user requirements with regulation-compliant layouts; and a GreenFlow generator trained on GreenPD with PDE feedback for controllable, regulation-aware generation. Experiments show that GreenPlanner accelerates evaluation by over $10^{5}\times$ with $>$99% accuracy, eliminates invalid samples, and boosts design efficiency by 87% over professional architects.

AI.tldr: GreenPlanner是一个能源和功能感知的生成框架，统一了设计评估和生成，通过自动化评估和生成符合规范的平面图，显著提高设计效率。
AI.motivation: 建筑设计直接影响人类福祉和碳排放，但生成空间功能和能源合规的平面图仍然是手动、昂贵且不可扩展的。现有方法产生视觉上合理的布局，但经常违反关键约束，由于缺乏自动化评估而产生无效结果。
AI.method: GreenPlanner框架包含：1) 用于学习约束先验的标记设计可行性数据集；2) 用于预测能源性能和空间功能有效性的快速实用设计评估器(PDE)；3) 通过PDE引导过滤得到的绿色平面数据集(GreenPD)，将用户需求与规范合规布局配对；4) 在GreenPD上训练并使用PDE反馈的GreenFlow生成器，实现可控、规范感知的生成。
AI.result: 实验表明，GreenPlanner将评估速度提高了超过10^5倍，准确率超过99%，消除了无效样本，设计效率比专业建筑师提高了87%。
AI.conclusion: GreenPlanner通过统一设计评估和生成，实现了自动化、高效且合规的建筑平面图设计，解决了现有方法违反约束和缺乏自动评估的问题。

title: Magnetic clusters in the paramagnetic phase of a high-temperature ferromagnetic metal-organic framework
summary: Owing to their exceptional chemical and electronic tunability, metal-organic frameworks can be designed to develop magnetic ground states making a range of applications feasible, from magnetic gas separation to the implementation of lightweight, rare-earth free permanent magnets. However, the typically weak exchange interactions mediated by the diamagnetic organic ligands result in ordering temperatures confined to the cryogenic limit. The itinerant magnetic ground state realized in the chromium-based framework Cr(tri)$_{2}$(CF$_{3}$SO$_{3}$)$_{0.33}$ (Htri, $1H$-$1$,$2$,$3$-triazole) is a remarkable exception to this trend, showing a robust ferromagnetic behavior almost at ambient conditions. Here, we use dc SQUID magnetometry, nuclear magnetic resonance, and ferromagnetic resonance to study the magnetic state realized in this material. We highlight several thermally-activated relaxation mechanisms for the nuclear magnetization due to the tendency of electrons towards localization at low temperatures as well as the rotational dynamics of the charge-balancing triflate ions confined within the pores. Most interestingly, we report the development within the paramagnetic regime of mesoscopic magnetic correlated clusters whose slow dynamics in the MHz range are tracked by the nuclear moments, in agreement with the highly unconventional nature of the magnetic transition detected by dc SQUID magnetometry. We discuss the similarity between the clustered phase in the paramagnetic phase and the magnetoelectronic phase segregation leading to colossal magnetoresistance in manganites and cobaltites. These results demonstrate that high-temperature magnetic metal-organic frameworks can serve as a versatile platform for exploring correlated electron phenomena in low-density, chemically tunable materials.

AI.tldr: 该研究报道了一种铬基金属有机框架材料在接近室温条件下展现的非常规铁磁行为，通过多种磁学表征手段揭示了其独特的电子局域化、离子旋转动力学以及顺磁区形成的介观磁性团簇。
AI.motivation: 金属有机框架材料因其化学和电子可调性在磁性应用中具有潜力，但通常由于有机配体的弱交换作用导致有序温度仅限于低温范围。本研究旨在探索一种在接近室温条件下展现铁磁行为的铬基金属有机框架材料的特殊磁性状态。
AI.method: 使用直流SQUID磁强计、核磁共振和铁磁共振等多种磁学表征技术，研究材料中的磁性状态、电子局域化效应、离子旋转动力学以及磁性团簇的形成机制。
AI.result: 发现该材料在顺磁区形成介观磁性相关团簇，其慢动力学在MHz范围内被核磁矩追踪；观察到电子在低温下的局域化趋势以及孔道内三氟甲磺酸离子的旋转动力学；这些结果与直流SQUID磁强计检测到的高度非常规磁性转变一致。
AI.conclusion: 高温磁性金属有机框架材料可作为探索低密度、化学可调材料中关联电子现象的多功能平台，其顺磁区的团簇相与锰酸盐和钴酸盐中导致巨磁电阻的磁电子相分离现象相似。

title: Optimized Many-Hypercube Codes toward Lower Logical Error Rates and Earlier Realization
summary: Many-hypercube codes [H. Goto, Sci. Adv. 10, eadp6388 (2024)], concatenated ${[[n,n-2,2]]}$ quantum error-detecting codes ($n$ is even), have recently been proposed as high-rate quantum codes suitable for fault-tolerant quantum computing. However, the original many-hypercube codes with ${n=6}$ have large code block sizes at high concatenation levels (216 and 1296 physical qubits per block at levels 3 and 4, respectively), making not only experimental realization difficult but also logical error rates high. Toward earlier experimental realization and lower logical error rates, here we investigate smaller many-hypercube codes obtained by concatenating $[[6,4,2]]$ and/or $[[4,2,2]]$ codes, where, e.g., $D_{6,4,4}$ denotes the many-hypercube code using $[[6,4,2]]$ at level 1 and $[[4,2,2]]$ at levels 2 and 3. As a result, we found a surprising fact: $D_{6,4,4}$ ($D_{6,6,4,4}$) can achieve lower block error rates than $D_{4,4,4}$ ($D_{4,4,4,4}$), despite its higher encoding rate. Focusing on level 3, we also developed efficient fault-tolerant encoders realizing about 60% overhead reduction while maintaining or even improving the performance, compared to the original design. Using them, we numerically confirmed that $D_{6,4,4}$ also achieves the best performance for logical controlled-NOT gates in a circuit-level noise model. These results will be useful for early experimental realization of fault-tolerant quantum computing with high-rate quantum codes.

AI.tldr: 研究探索了使用[[6,4,2]]和[[4,2,2]]码构建的更小规模多超立方码，发现D6,4,4在保持高编码率的同时能实现更低的块错误率，并开发了高效的容错编码器。
AI.motivation: 原始多超立方码(n=6)在高级联水平下块尺寸过大(216和1296物理量子比特)，导致实验实现困难且逻辑错误率高。需要寻找更小规模的多超立方码以实现早期实验实现和更低错误率。
AI.method: 通过级联[[6,4,2]]和/或[[4,2,2]]量子错误检测码构建更小的多超立方码，例如D6,4,4表示在第1层使用[[6,4,2]]码，在第2、3层使用[[4,2,2]]码。开发了高效的容错编码器，实现了约60%的开销减少。
AI.result: 发现D6,4,4(D6,6,4,4)相比D4,4,4(D4,4,4,4)能实现更低的块错误率，尽管其编码率更高。在第3层，高效容错编码器在保持甚至改善性能的同时减少了约60%的开销。数值模拟确认D6,4,4在电路级噪声模型中也能实现逻辑CNOT门的最佳性能。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为使用高编码率量子码实现早期容错量子计算的实验提供了有用指导，展示了更小规模多超立方码在降低错误率和减少开销方面的优势。

title: Quasistatic response for nonequilibrium processes: evaluating the Berry potential and curvature
summary: We investigate how introducing slow, time-dependent perturbations to a steady, nonequilibrium process alters the expected (excess) values of important observables, such as the dynamical activity and entropy flux. When we make a cyclic thermodynamic transformation, the excesses are described in terms of a (geometric) Berry phase with corresponding Berry potential and Berry curvature quantifying the response. Focussing on Markov jump processes, we show how a non-zero Berry curvature leads to a breakdown of the thermodynamic Maxwell relations and of the Clausius heat theorem. We also present a variant of the Aharonov-Bohm effect in which the parameters follow a curve with vanishing Berry curvature, but the system still experiences a nonzero Berry phase. Finally, we identify (sufficient) no-localization conditions in terms of mean first-passage times under which the corresponding Berry potentials and curvatures vanish at absolute zero, extending, for arbitrary driving, e.g. the case of vanishing heat capacity as for the Nernst postulate.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了在稳态非平衡过程中引入缓慢时间依赖扰动如何改变重要观测量的期望值，如动力学活性和熵流。研究发现循环热力学变换中的超额值可以用几何Berry相描述，Berry势和Berry曲率量化了系统的响应。
AI.motivation: 研究非平衡过程中时间依赖扰动对系统行为的影响，特别是理解循环热力学变换中出现的几何Berry相及其对热力学关系的影响。
AI.method: 聚焦于马尔可夫跳跃过程，分析慢时间依赖扰动下的系统响应。使用Berry相、Berry势和Berry曲率等几何概念来描述循环变换中的超额值。
AI.result: 非零Berry曲率导致热力学麦克斯韦关系和克劳修斯热定理的失效。发现了类似Aharonov-Bohm效应的现象，即使Berry曲率为零，系统仍能经历非零Berry相。确定了在绝对零度下Berry势和曲率消失的充分非局域化条件。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了非平衡过程中几何Berry相的重要作用，扩展了对热力学关系在时间依赖扰动下行为的理解，特别是在绝对零度附近的行为。

title: Mind the data gap: Missingness Still Shapes Large Language Model Prognoses
summary: Data collection often reflects human decisions. In healthcare, for instance, a referral for a diagnostic test is influenced by the patient's health, their preferences, available resources, and the practitioner's recommendations. Despite the extensive literature on the informativeness of missingness, its implications on the performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) have not been studied. Through a series of experiments on data from Columbia University Medical Center, a large urban academic medical center, and MIMIC-IV, we demonstrate that patterns of missingness significantly impact zero-shot predictive performance. Notably, the explicit inclusion of missingness indicators at prompting benefits some while hurting other LLMs' zero-shot predictive performance and calibration, suggesting an inconsistent impact. The proposed aggregated analysis and theoretical insights suggest that larger models benefit from these interventions, while smaller models can be negatively impacted. The LLM paradigm risks obscuring the impact of missingness, often neglected even in conventional ML, even further. We conclude that there is a need for more transparent accounting and systematic evaluation of the impact of representing (informative) missingness on downstream performance.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了数据缺失模式对大型语言模型（LLMs）零样本预测性能的影响，发现缺失指示符的显式包含对不同规模的LLMs产生不一致影响，大模型受益而小模型可能受损。
AI.motivation: 尽管已有大量关于缺失信息价值的研究，但数据缺失模式对大型语言模型性能的影响尚未被充分探索。在医疗等实际应用中，数据收集过程反映了人类决策，这种缺失模式可能对LLMs的预测性能产生重要影响。
AI.method: 研究通过在哥伦比亚大学医学中心（大型城市学术医疗中心）和MIMIC-IV数据集上进行一系列实验，分析缺失模式对LLMs零样本预测性能的影响。特别考察了在提示中显式包含缺失指示符对不同规模LLMs的影响。
AI.result: 实验表明：1）缺失模式显著影响零样本预测性能；2）显式包含缺失指示符对某些LLMs有益，但对其他LLMs的预测性能和校准产生负面影响；3）聚合分析和理论洞察表明，较大模型从这些干预中受益，而较小模型可能受到负面影响。
AI.conclusion: LLM范式可能进一步掩盖缺失信息的影响（即使在传统机器学习中也常被忽视）。需要更透明的记录和系统评估表示（信息性）缺失对下游性能的影响。

title: Dynamics of superconducting pairs in the two-dimensional Hubbard model
summary: The frequency structure of the superconducting correlations in cuprates gives insights on the pairing mechanism. Here we present an exhaustive study of this problem in the two-dimensional Hubbard model with cellular dynamical mean-field theory. To this end, we systematically quantify the dependence on doping and interaction strength of the superconducting gap, of the frequency scales where pairing occurs, and of their relative contribution to pairing. We find pair-forming alternating with pair-breaking processes as a function of frequency, providing new evidence that pairing can arise in principle from both low- and high-frequency processes. However, we find that the high-frequency pair-forming processes are outweighed by pair-breaking ones. Hence, the net contribution to pairing comes only from the low-frequency pair-forming processes, a result that underscores their key role in the pairing mechanism.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过二维哈伯德模型和细胞动力学平均场理论，系统分析了铜氧化物超导关联的频率结构，发现配对形成和配对破坏过程随频率交替出现，但净配对贡献仅来自低频配对形成过程。
AI.motivation: 铜氧化物超导关联的频率结构能为配对机制提供重要见解，但需要系统研究其在哈伯德模型中的表现，以理解不同频率过程对配对的相对贡献。
AI.method: 使用二维哈伯德模型结合细胞动力学平均场理论，系统量化了掺杂和相互作用强度对超导能隙、配对发生频率尺度及其相对贡献的依赖性。
AI.result: 发现配对形成和配对破坏过程随频率交替出现，表明理论上配对可来自低频和高频过程。但高频配对形成过程被配对破坏过程抵消，净配对贡献仅来自低频配对形成过程。
AI.conclusion: 低频配对形成过程在配对机制中起关键作用，高频过程虽然存在配对形成成分，但净效应被配对破坏过程抵消，无法贡献净配对。

title: Physical Probability in the Everett Interpretation and Bell Inequalities
comment: To appear in Alyssa Ney (ed), Everett and Nonlocality, Oxford University Press, 2026
summary: I define a notion of local causality LOC closely modelled on the Bell principle, construed as the condition that single case probabilities cannot be modified by actions at spacelike separation. The new principle, like that of Bell, forces Bell inequalities, but with two loopholes: one is retrocausation, known to Bell, but the other is nonuniqueness of remote outcomes, a loophole only for LOC, not for the Bell principle. I also set out a theory of physical probability, applicable to the Everett interpretation, in agreement with the Born rule, and therefore violating Bell inequalities. I show it is consistent with LOC. Surprisingly, both loopholes are exploited. I conclude not only that probability in the Everett interpretation involves no action at a distance, but that the observed violations of Bell inequalities is powerful evidence for many worlds.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一种局部因果性LOC概念，基于贝尔原理但允许两个漏洞：逆因果性和远程结果非唯一性，并展示了多世界解释如何利用这两个漏洞与LOC一致地违反贝尔不等式。
AI.motivation: 研究量子力学中的概率本质，特别是多世界解释如何与局部因果性相容，同时解释贝尔不等式的违反现象。
AI.method: 定义局部因果性LOC原则，分析其与贝尔原理的区别，识别两个关键漏洞（逆因果性和远程结果非唯一性），并构建适用于多世界解释的物理概率理论。
AI.result: 多世界解释中的概率理论与波恩规则一致，违反贝尔不等式，但通过利用LOC的两个漏洞与局部因果性保持相容。
AI.conclusion: 多世界解释中的概率不涉及超距作用，而观察到的贝尔不等式违反现象实际上为多世界解释提供了有力证据。

title: Digamma-Function Representation of the Ground-State Energy in Antiferromagnetic Heisenberg $\mathrm{XXX}_s$ Spin Chains
summary: The antiferromagnetic Heisenberg spin chain remains a central framework for exploring exactly solvable models within quantum integrable systems. For the isotropic XXX chain, the ground-state energy per site of the spin-1/2 system is famously given by ln2. Extending the classic formulations to arbitrary spin-s, Takhtajan and Babujian derived two separate finite-series expressions for integer and half-integer spin representations. Current work introduces a unified analytical expression for the ground-state energy density in terms of the digamma function. This compact formulation reproduces both Takhtajan Babujian series.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个统一的解析表达式，用digamma函数表示任意自旋s的XXX海森堡链基态能量密度，统一了Takhtajan和Babujian分别针对整数和半整数自旋的两个有限级数表达式。
AI.motivation: 反铁磁海森堡自旋链是量子可积系统中研究精确可解模型的核心框架。对于各向同性的XXX链，自旋-1/2系统的基态能量密度已知为ln2。Takhtajan和Babujian将经典公式推广到任意自旋s，但分别针对整数和半整数自旋推导了两个独立的有限级数表达式。需要一种统一的表达式来涵盖所有情况。
AI.method: 引入一个统一的解析表达式，使用digamma函数来表示基态能量密度。这个紧凑的公式能够重现Takhtajan和Babujian的两个有限级数表达式。
AI.result: 成功推导出一个统一的digamma函数表达式，该表达式能够准确再现Takhtajan和Babujian分别针对整数和半整数自旋的两个有限级数表达式。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入digamma函数的统一表达式，成功解决了XXX海森堡链基态能量密度在整数和半整数自旋情况下的分离表示问题，提供了一个简洁而全面的解析公式。

title: Clinical-R1: Empowering Large Language Models for Faithful and Comprehensive Reasoning with Clinical Objective Relative Policy Optimization
summary: Recent advances in large language models (LLMs) have shown strong reasoning capabilities through large-scale pretraining and post-training reinforcement learning, demonstrated by DeepSeek-R1. However, current post-training methods, such as Grouped Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO), mainly reward correctness, which is not aligned with the multi-dimensional objectives required in high-stakes fields such as medicine, where reasoning must also be faithful and comprehensive. We introduce Clinical-Objective Relative Policy Optimization (CRPO), a scalable, multi-objective, verifiable reinforcement learning method designed to align LLM post-training with clinical reasoning principles. CRPO integrates rule-based and verifiable reward signals that jointly optimize accuracy, faithfulness, and comprehensiveness without relying on human annotation. To demonstrate its effectiveness, we train Clinical-R1-3B, a 3B-parameter model for clinical reasoning. The experiments on three benchmarks demonstrate that our CRPO substantially improves reasoning on truthfulness and completeness over standard GRPO while maintaining comfortable accuracy enhancements. This framework provides a scalable pathway to align LLM reasoning with clinical objectives, enabling safer and more collaborative AI systems for healthcare while also highlighting the potential of multi-objective, verifiable RL methods in post-training scaling of LLMs for medical domains.

AI.tldr: CRPO是一种针对临床推理的多目标可验证强化学习方法，通过整合基于规则和可验证的奖励信号，在保持准确性的同时提升真实性和完整性。
AI.motivation: 当前LLM后训练方法（如GRPO）主要奖励正确性，这与医学等高风险领域需要多维度目标（如忠实性和全面性）不匹配，需要开发能同时优化准确性、忠实性和全面性的方法。
AI.method: 提出临床目标相对策略优化（CRPO），一种可扩展的多目标可验证强化学习方法，整合基于规则和可验证的奖励信号，无需人工标注，联合优化准确性、忠实性和全面性。
AI.result: 训练了3B参数的Clinical-R1-3B模型，在三个基准测试中，CRPO相比标准GRPO在真实性和完整性方面显著提升，同时保持准确性增强。
AI.conclusion: CRPO为LLM推理与临床目标对齐提供了可扩展路径，使医疗AI系统更安全、更具协作性，同时展示了多目标可验证RL方法在医学领域LLM后训练中的潜力。

title: Generalized Nagaoka ferromagnetism accompanied by flavor-selective Mott states in an SU($N$) Fermi-Hubbard model
summary: We study the ferromagnetic instability in an SU($N$) Fermi-Hubbard model on the hypercubic lattice. Combining dynamical mean-field theory with continuous-time quantum Monte Carlo simulations, we find that, in the strong-coupling regime at low temperatures, ferromagnetically ordered (FM) states develop away from the commensurate fillings. In the particle-doped SU($3$) system near one-third filling, the FM state is accompanied by a spontaneous flavor-selective Mott state, where two of the three flavors are Mott insulating while the remaining flavor is metallic. Since particles in the metallic flavor can almost freely move on the lattice without correlation effects, the ordered state is stabilized by the kinetic-energy gain of the doped particles. This is similar to the generalized Nagaoka ferromagnetism discussed in the one-hole-doped system at one-third filling. In the SU($4$) case, we find that six distinct types of FM states appear as the particle density varies. The results uncover the nature of the FM state in the SU($N$) Fermi-Hubbard systems and highlight the rich magnetic behavior enabled by enlarged internal symmetries.

AI.tldr: 研究SU(N)费米-哈伯德模型在强耦合低温下的铁磁不稳定性，发现远离整数填充时会出现铁磁有序态，其中SU(3)系统存在自发味道选择性莫特态，SU(4)系统则有六种不同类型的铁磁态。
AI.motivation: 探索具有扩展内部对称性的SU(N)费米-哈伯德系统中的铁磁不稳定性，特别是在强耦合低温条件下，理解这些系统中丰富的磁行为。
AI.method: 结合动力学平均场理论和连续时间量子蒙特卡洛模拟，研究超立方晶格上的SU(N)费米-哈伯德模型。
AI.result: 在强耦合低温条件下，远离整数填充时出现铁磁有序态；SU(3)系统中在三分之一填充附近观察到自发味道选择性莫特态，其中两种味道为莫特绝缘体，一种为金属；SU(4)系统中随着粒子密度变化出现六种不同类型的铁磁态。
AI.conclusion: SU(N)费米-哈伯德系统中的铁磁态具有丰富多样的性质，扩展的内部对称性使得磁性行为更加复杂，其中掺杂粒子的动能增益对铁磁态的稳定起着关键作用。

title: Geometric Parameterization of Kraus Operators with Applications to Quasi Inverse Channels for Multi Qubit Systems
summary: This work presents a differentiable geometric parameterization of quantum channels in Kraus representation, which can be efficiently probed to find an unknown quantum channel. We explore its feasibility in finding the quasi inverse channels, which can be a tedious analytically for complex noise processes and is often achievable only for a limited range of parameters. In this regard, machine learning based algorithms have been employed successfully to find quasi inverse of quantum channels. The space of quantum channels in this scheme is a unit hypersphere, and components of mutually constrained unit vectors residing in this space, are used to construct a physically valid quantum channel. Symplectic constraints, orthogonality, and unit length of the vectors suffice to maintain complete positivity and the trace-preserving property of the channels. By performing gradient descent on this parametric space with a fidelity-based loss function, this approach is found to optimize quasi inverse of a variety of quantum channels, not limited to single-qubits, proving its effectiveness.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于Kraus表示的可微分几何参数化量子信道方法，通过机器学习优化寻找量子信道的拟逆信道
AI.motivation: 对于复杂噪声过程的量子信道，寻找其拟逆信道通常解析计算繁琐且参数范围有限，需要更高效的数值方法
AI.method: 将量子信道参数化为单位超球面上的单位向量，通过辛约束、正交性和单位长度保证信道的完全正性和保迹性，使用基于保真度的损失函数进行梯度下降优化
AI.result: 该方法能够有效优化多种量子信道的拟逆信道，不仅限于单量子比特系统，证明了其有效性
AI.conclusion: 提出的可微分几何参数化方法为寻找复杂量子信道的拟逆信道提供了一种有效的机器学习解决方案

title: Thermodynamic Geometry Through Second Order Phase Transitions
summary: A common approach to quantify excess dissipation in slowly driven thermodynamic processes is through the use of a Riemannian metric on the space of control parameters, where optimal driving protocols follow geodesics. Near phase transitions, this geometric picture breaks down as the metric diverges and geodesics may cease to exist. Using Widom scaling, we analyze this framework for several universality classes and show that in some cases the thermodynamic length across the phase transition remains finite. We then demonstrate a numerical approach for computing minimal paths in such systems. We show that, in some regimes, the shortest path crosses the phase transition - even when alternative paths confined to a single phase exist.

AI.tldr: 论文研究相变附近缓慢驱动热力学过程中的过度耗散问题，发现某些情况下跨越相变的热力学长度保持有限，且最短路径可能穿越相变
AI.motivation: 传统方法使用控制参数空间的黎曼度量来量化缓慢驱动热力学过程中的过度耗散，但在相变附近这一几何框架会失效，因为度量会发散且测地线可能不存在。需要研究相变附近这一框架的行为。
AI.method: 使用Widom标度分析多个普适类，并开发数值方法计算此类系统中的最小路径
AI.result: 在某些情况下，跨越相变的热力学长度保持有限。在某些区域，最短路径会穿越相变，即使存在局限于单一相内的替代路径
AI.conclusion: 相变附近的热力学几何框架比预期更稳健，跨越相变的路径在某些情况下可能是最优选择，这对优化缓慢驱动过程有重要意义

title: EDIT: Early Diffusion Inference Termination for dLLMs Based on Dynamics of Training Gradients
summary: Diffusion-based large language models (dLLMs) refine token generations through iterative denoising, but answers often stabilize before all steps complete. We propose EDIT (Early Diffusion Inference Termination), an inference-time criterion that adaptively stops denoising once sufficient reasoning stability relative to training-time reasoning is detected. EDIT monitors the alignment between token activations and a reasoning map derived from AdamW-aggregated LoRA updates captured during supervised fine-tuning (SFT). During training, optimization dynamics generate rich metadata about parameter importance that in prior methods is typically discarded upon model release. We preserve this information as a compact representation of learned reasoning pathways. During inference, alignment scores are converted to a distribution over the tokens already unmasked at the current denoising step, and convergence is detected when KL divergence between consecutive steps falls below a threshold on the matched unmasked (visible) tokens. Across reasoning benchmarks, EDIT reduces diffusion steps by 11.8% to 68.3% while preserving or improving accuracy in most settings, with approximately 0.02% storage overhead (about 1.5-2 MB for all QKV modules across 32 blocks in an 8 GB model). By utilizing training-gradient dynamics, our work opens a new research direction for reducing dLLM inference time and cost.

AI.tldr: EDIT方法通过监测推理稳定性来自适应提前终止扩散模型的去噪过程，利用训练时梯度动态信息减少推理步骤11.8%-68.3%，存储开销仅0.02%
AI.motivation: 扩散大语言模型通过迭代去噪生成答案，但答案通常在完成所有步骤前就已稳定。现有方法在模型发布时丢弃了训练过程中产生的丰富元数据，特别是关于参数重要性的优化动态信息。
AI.method: 提出EDIT方法：1) 在监督微调期间捕获AdamW聚合的LoRA更新，构建推理路径的紧凑表示；2) 推理时监测token激活与推理图的对齐度；3) 将对齐分数转换为当前去噪步骤已解掩码token的分布；4) 当连续步骤间KL散度低于阈值时检测收敛并提前终止。
AI.result: 在多个推理基准测试中，EDIT将扩散步骤减少11.8%至68.3%，同时在大多数情况下保持或提高了准确性。存储开销约为0.02%（对于8GB模型的所有QKV模块约1.5-2MB）。
AI.conclusion: 通过利用训练梯度动态，EDIT为减少扩散大语言模型的推理时间和成本开辟了新的研究方向，实现了高效的推理时间自适应终止机制。

title: BioArc: Discovering Optimal Neural Architectures for Biological Foundation Models
summary: Foundation models have revolutionized various fields such as natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV). While efforts have been made to transfer the success of the foundation models in general AI domains to biology, existing works focus on directly adopting the existing foundation model architectures from general machine learning domains without a systematic design considering the unique physicochemical and structural properties of each biological data modality. This leads to suboptimal performance, as these repurposed architectures struggle to capture the long-range dependencies, sparse information, and complex underlying ``grammars'' inherent to biological data. To address this gap, we introduce BioArc, a novel framework designed to move beyond intuition-driven architecture design towards principled, automated architecture discovery for biological foundation models. Leveraging Neural Architecture Search (NAS), BioArc systematically explores a vast architecture design space, evaluating architectures across multiple biological modalities while rigorously analyzing the interplay between architecture, tokenization, and training strategies. This large-scale analysis identifies novel, high-performance architectures, allowing us to distill a set of empirical design principles to guide future model development. Furthermore, to make the best of this set of discovered principled architectures, we propose and compare several architecture prediction methods that effectively and efficiently predict optimal architectures for new biological tasks. Overall, our work provides a foundational resource and a principled methodology to guide the creation of the next generation of task-specific and foundation models for biology.

AI.tldr: BioArc框架通过神经架构搜索为生物数据自动发现最优基础模型架构，超越直觉驱动设计，提供系统化方法论
AI.motivation: 现有生物基础模型直接采用通用AI架构，未考虑生物数据的独特物理化学和结构特性，导致性能不佳，无法捕捉生物数据的长程依赖、稀疏信息和复杂"语法"
AI.method: 提出BioArc框架，利用神经架构搜索系统探索架构设计空间，评估多种生物模态，分析架构、分词和训练策略的相互作用，并开发架构预测方法为新任务预测最优架构
AI.result: 大规模分析发现新颖高性能架构，提炼出一套经验设计原则指导未来模型开发，并提供有效的架构预测方法
AI.conclusion: BioArc为下一代生物任务特定模型和基础模型提供了基础资源和原则性方法论，推动生物AI从直觉驱动向系统化架构设计转变

title: Disorder Suppression of Charge Density Wave in the Honeycomb Holstein Model
comment: 7 pages, 6 figures, theoretical study on condensed matter physics (honeycomb lattice Holstein model); no generative AI tools used in research
summary: The formation of charge-density-wave order in Dirac fermion systems via electron-phonon coupling represents a significant topic in condensed matter physics. In this work, we investigate this phenomenon within the Holstein model on the honeycomb lattice, with a specific focus on the effect of disorder. While the interplay between electron-electron interactions and disorder has long been a central theme in the field, recent attention has increasingly turned to the combined influence of disorder and electron-phonon coupling. Using determinant quantum Monte Carlo simulations, we concentrate on the phase transitions of charge-density-wave order on the honeycomb lattice. Disorder is introduced through the random hopping of electrons in the system, which can localize electrons via the Anderson effect. Our primary result is that disorder suppresses the charge-density-wave phase, and the interplay between disorder and electron-phonon interactions extends the phase area. We also determine the transition temperature \(β_c\) to the ordered phase as a function of the electron-phonon coupling. Additionally, we observed a suppression of electron kinetic energy and dc conductivity under disorder, highlighting the role of Anderson localization in the degradation of electronic transport. These findings offer significant theoretical insight into the stability and critical phenomena of correlated phases in disordered two-dimensional systems.

AI.tldr: 研究无序对狄拉克费米子系统中电荷密度波序的影响，发现无序抑制电荷密度波相，但无序与电子-声子相互作用的结合扩展了相区范围。
AI.motivation: 研究无序和电子-声子耦合的联合效应对狄拉克费米子系统中电荷密度波形成的影响，这是凝聚态物理中的重要课题。
AI.method: 使用行列式量子蒙特卡洛模拟，在蜂窝晶格上的Holstein模型中研究电荷密度波相变，通过电子随机跳跃引入无序。
AI.result: 无序抑制电荷密度波相，但无序与电子-声子相互作用的结合扩展了相区；确定了有序相转变温度与电子-声子耦合的函数关系；观察到无序下电子动能和直流电导率被抑制。
AI.conclusion: 这些发现为理解无序二维系统中关联相的稳定性和临界现象提供了重要理论见解，突出了安德森局域化在电子输运退化中的作用。

title: On-Chip Levitated Neon Particle Arrays for Robust and Scalable Electron Qubits
summary: Electron-on-neon (eNe) qubits have recently emerged as a compelling platform for quantum computing, which combines the vacuum isolation advantages of trapped-ion qubits with the scalability of superconducting circuits. In this system, electrons are trapped in vacuum above a solid neon film deposited on superconducting microwave resonators, where they exhibit strong coupling to the resonators, coherence times of ~0.1 ms, and single-qubit gate fidelities exceeding 99.97%. A central challenge, however, is the spontaneous binding of electrons to neon surface bumps. These bumps, originating from substrate roughness, vary in size: electrons on bumps of suitable sizes within the resonator can couple to microwave photons and function as qubits, whereas those on unfavorable bumps remain inactive yet contribute to background charge noise. Moreover, both the bump landscape and the sites where electrons bind differ from run to run, leading to irreproducible qubit characteristics that hinder scalability. To address this challenging issue, we present an on-chip magnetic-levitation architecture in which arrays of solid-neon microparticles are suspended above the processor chip to act as electron carriers. This design eliminates substrate effects while retaining strong qubit-resonator coupling and supporting inter-qubit connectivity. Our analysis further shows that the qubit transition frequency can be tuned across the gigahertz range and its anharmonicity can reach ~0.8 GHz by tuning the resonator bias voltage. Together, these features suggest a promising pathway toward robust, reproducible, and scalable eNe-based quantum computing.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种片上磁悬浮架构，通过悬浮固态氖微粒作为电子载体，解决电子-氖量子比特中因衬底粗糙度导致的不可重复性问题，实现可扩展的量子计算。
AI.motivation: 电子-氖量子比特虽然结合了离子阱的真空隔离优势和超导电路的可扩展性，但存在自发电子绑定到氖表面凸起的问题。这些凸起源于衬底粗糙度，导致量子比特特性不可重复，阻碍了可扩展性。
AI.method: 提出片上磁悬浮架构，将固态氖微粒阵列悬浮在处理器芯片上方作为电子载体。这种设计消除了衬底效应，同时保留了强量子比特-谐振器耦合，并支持量子比特间连接。通过调节谐振器偏置电压，量子比特跃迁频率可在GHz范围内调谐。
AI.result: 该架构能够消除衬底粗糙度的影响，保持强量子比特-谐振器耦合，量子比特跃迁频率可在GHz范围内调谐，非谐性可达~0.8 GHz。解决了电子-氖量子比特的不可重复性问题。
AI.conclusion: 片上磁悬浮架构为电子-氖量子比特提供了一条通向稳健、可重复和可扩展量子计算的有前景路径，解决了当前平台面临的主要挑战。

title: Piston-Like Information Engine I: Universal Features in Equilibrium
summary: The ability to measure the stochastic degrees of freedom of a thermal system enables the extraction of energy from an equilibrium heat bath. This is the underlying principle of Maxwell's demon and subsequent information engines. Here, we experimentally realize a microscopic information engine configured as a compressible piston containing a thermalized colloidal suspension. The particle positions are recorded to identify when a predefined region near the wall is empty, allowing the piston to compress the colloidal suspension without applying work on the system. We find that the stored compression energy is universally set by the probability of a positive measurement outcome, which in turn is controlled by parameters such as density and compression step size. We further demonstrate that mechanical work can be extracted during the decompression of the piston, thereby closing the engine's operating cycle.

AI.tldr: 实验实现了一种基于信息的热机，通过测量胶体悬浮液中粒子的位置信息，在无需施加功的情况下压缩活塞，并从中提取机械功。
AI.motivation: 研究如何通过测量热系统的随机自由度来从平衡热浴中提取能量，这是麦克斯韦妖和信息引擎的基本原理。
AI.method: 实验实现了一个微观信息引擎，配置为包含热化胶体悬浮液的可压缩活塞。记录粒子位置以识别靠近壁面的预定区域何时为空，从而在不施加功的情况下压缩胶体悬浮液。
AI.result: 发现存储的压缩能量普遍由正测量结果的概率决定，该概率受密度和压缩步长等参数控制。进一步证明在活塞减压过程中可以提取机械功，从而完成引擎的操作循环。
AI.conclusion: 成功实现了基于信息测量的微观热机，验证了通过测量热系统随机自由度从热浴中提取能量的可行性，并建立了压缩能量与测量概率之间的普遍关系。

title: Model of human cognition
summary: The development of large language models (LLMs) is limited by a lack of explainability, the absence of a unifying theory, and prohibitive operational costs. We propose a neuro-theoretical framework for the emergence of intelligence in systems that is both functionally robust and biologically plausible. The model provides theoretical insights into cognitive processes such as decision-making and problem solving, and a computationally efficient approach for the creation of explainable and generalizable artificial intelligence.

AI.tldr: 提出一种神经理论框架，解释智能在系统中的涌现，该框架既功能鲁棒又生物合理，为认知过程提供理论洞见，并为创建可解释、可泛化的人工智能提供计算高效方法。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型的发展受到缺乏可解释性、缺乏统一理论以及高昂运营成本的限制。为了解决这些问题，需要一种既能解释智能涌现机制，又具有生物合理性的理论框架。
AI.method: 提出一种神经理论框架，该框架基于生物合理的神经机制，解释智能在系统中的涌现过程。该模型为决策制定和问题解决等认知过程提供理论解释，并采用计算高效的方法。
AI.result: 该框架为理解智能涌现提供了理论洞见，同时提供了一种创建可解释、可泛化人工智能的计算高效方法，解决了当前LLM在可解释性、理论统一性和成本方面的问题。
AI.conclusion: 提出的神经理论框架为智能系统的涌现提供了既功能鲁棒又生物合理的解释，为开发可解释、可泛化且计算高效的人工智能系统提供了理论基础和方法路径。

title: $\mathbb{Z}_2$ Vortex Crystal Candidate in the Triangular $S=1/2$ Quantum Antiferromagnet
summary: The prospect of merging the paradigms of geometric frustration on a triangular lattice and bond anisotropies in the strong spin-orbit coupling limit holds tremendous promise in the ongoing hunt for exotic quantum materials. Here we identify a new candidate system to realize such physics, the organic quantum antiferromagnet (CD$_3$ND$_3$)$_2$NaRuCl$_6$. We report a combination of thermodynamic, magneto-elastic and neutron scattering experiments on single-crystals to determine the phase diagram in axial magnetic fields $\mathbf{H \parallel c}$ and propose a minimal model Hamiltonian. (CD$_3$ND$_3$)$_2$NaRuCl$_6$ displays an ideal triangular arrangement of Ru$^{3+}$ ions adopting the spin-orbital entangled $j_{\rm eff} = 1/2$ state. It hosts residual magnetic order below $T_{\rm N} = 0.23$ K and a highly unusual $H-T$ phase diagram including three different incommensurate states. Spin-waves in the high-field polarized regime are well described by a Heisenberg-like triangular lattice Hamiltonian with a potential sub-leading bond dependent anisotropy term. We discuss possible candidate magnetic structures in the various observed phases and propose two mechanisms that could explain the field-dependent incommensurability, requiring either a small ferromagnetic Kitaev term or a tiny magneto-elastic $J-J'$ isosceles distortion driven by pseudospin-lattice coupling. We argue that the multi-$\mathbf{q}$ ground state in zero magnetic field is a prime candidate for hosting the $\mathbb{Z}_2$ vortex crystal proposed on the triangular Heisenberg-Kitaev model. (CD$_3$ND$_3$)$_2$NaRuCl$_6$ is the first member in an extended family of quantum triangular lattice magnets, providing a new playground to study the interplay of geometric frustration and spin-orbit effects.

AI.tldr: 该研究报道了一种新型有机量子反铁磁体(CD₃ND₃)₂NaRuCl₆，它结合了三角晶格几何阻挫和强自旋轨道耦合，展示了独特的磁场-温度相图，包含三种不同的非公度态，是研究几何阻挫与自旋轨道效应相互作用的新平台。
AI.motivation: 探索在三角晶格几何阻挫和强自旋轨道耦合极限下键各向异性相结合的新型量子材料，寻找能够实现奇异量子物理的候选系统。
AI.method: 通过热力学、磁弹性和中子散射实验相结合的方法，在轴向磁场条件下研究单晶样品的相图，并提出最小模型哈密顿量来描述系统。
AI.result: 发现(CD₃ND₃)₂NaRuCl₆具有理想的Ru³⁺三角排列，采用自旋轨道纠缠的j_eff = 1/2态，在T_N = 0.23 K以下存在残余磁序，并展现出包含三种不同非公度态的异常H-T相图。高场极化区的自旋波可以用具有潜在次主导键依赖各向异性项的海森堡三角晶格哈密顿量描述。
AI.conclusion: 该材料是扩展量子三角晶格磁体家族的第一个成员，为零磁场下的多q基态提供了研究Z₂涡旋晶体的理想平台，提出了两种可能解释场依赖非公度性的机制，为研究几何阻挫和自旋轨道效应的相互作用开辟了新领域。

title: Non-Negative Matrix Factorization Using Non-Von Neumann Computers
summary: Non-negative matrix factorization (NMF) is a matrix decomposition problem with applications in unsupervised learning. The general form of this problem (along with many of its variants) is NP-hard in nature. In our work, we explore how this problem could be solved with an energy-based optimization method suitable for certain machines with non-von Neumann architectures. We used the Dirac-3, a device based on the entropy computing paradigm and made by Quantum Computing Inc., to evaluate our approach. Our formulations consist of (i) a quadratic unconstrained binary optimization model (QUBO, suitable for Ising machines) and a quartic formulation that allows for real-valued and integer variables (suitable for machines like the Dirac-3). Although current devices cannot solve large NMF problems, the results of our preliminary experiments are promising enough to warrant further research. For non-negative real matrices, we observed that a fusion approach of first using Dirac-3 and then feeding its results as the initial factor matrices to Scikit-learn's NMF procedure outperforms Scikit-learn's NMF procedure on its own, with default parameters in terms of the error in the reconstructed matrices. For our experiments on non-negative integer matrices, we compared the Dirac-3 device to Google's CP-SAT solver (inside the Or-Tools package) and found that for serial processing, Dirac-3 outperforms CP-SAT in a majority of the cases. We believe that future work in this area might be able to identify domains and variants of the problem where entropy computing (and other non-von Neumann architectures) could offer a clear advantage.

AI.tldr: 本文探索使用基于熵计算范式的非冯·诺依曼架构设备（Dirac-3）解决非负矩阵分解问题，通过QUBO和四次型两种建模方法，在小型问题上取得优于传统方法的初步结果。
AI.motivation: 非负矩阵分解（NMF）在无监督学习中应用广泛，但其一般形式是NP难问题。作者希望探索非冯·诺依曼架构（特别是基于熵计算的设备）能否为这类优化问题提供新的解决方案。
AI.method: 1. 为NMF问题开发了两种优化模型：适合伊辛机的二次无约束二进制优化（QUBO）模型，以及适合Dirac-3设备的允许实值和整数变量的四次型模型。2. 使用Quantum Computing Inc.的Dirac-3设备进行评估。3. 对非负实值矩阵采用融合方法：先用Dirac-3求解，再将结果作为初始因子矩阵输入Scikit-learn的NMF过程。4. 对非负整数矩阵，将Dirac-3与Google的CP-SAT求解器进行比较。
AI.result: 1. 对于非负实值矩阵，Dirac-3+Scikit-learn融合方法在默认参数下，重构矩阵误差优于单独使用Scikit-learn的NMF。2. 对于非负整数矩阵，在串行处理中，Dirac-3在大多数情况下优于Google的CP-SAT求解器。3. 当前设备尚无法解决大规模NMF问题，但初步实验结果令人鼓舞。
AI.conclusion: 基于熵计算的非冯·诺依曼架构设备（如Dirac-3）在解决NMF问题上显示出潜力，特别是在小型问题和特定变体上。未来研究应探索这类架构在哪些问题领域和变体上能提供明显优势。

title: Spontaneous Symmetry Breaking in Two-dimensional Long-range Heisenberg Model
summary: The introduction of decaying long-range (LR) interactions $1/r^{d+σ}$ has drawn persistent interest in understanding how system properties evolve with $σ$. The Sak's criterion and the extended Mermin-Wagner theorem have gained broad acceptance in predicting the critical and low-temperature (low-T) behaviors of such systems. We perform large-scale Monte Carlo simulations for the LR-Heisenberg model in two dimensions (2D) up to linear size $L=8192$, and show that, as long as for $σ\leq 2$, the system exhibits spontaneous symmetry breaking, via a single continuous phase transition, and develops a generic long-range order. We then introduce an LR simple random walk (LR-SRW) with the total walk length fixed at O($L^d$), satisfying the extensivity of statistical systems, and observe that the LR-SRW can faithfully characterize the low-T scaling behaviors of the LR-Heisenberg model in both 2D and 3D, as induced by Goldstone-mode fluctuations. Finally, based on insights from LR-SRW, we propose a general criterion for the phase transition and the low-T properties of LR statistical systems with continuous symmetry in any spatial dimension.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过大规模蒙特卡洛模拟和长程随机行走模型，揭示了长程相互作用海森堡模型在二维和三维中的相变和低温行为，提出了描述长程统计系统相变和低温性质的一般准则。
AI.motivation: 研究长程相互作用系统（1/r^(d+σ)）的性质如何随σ变化，验证Sak准则和扩展Mermin-Wagner定理的预测，理解长程相互作用对系统临界和低温行为的影响。
AI.method: 1. 对二维长程海森堡模型进行大规模蒙特卡洛模拟（线性尺寸L=8192）；2. 引入长程简单随机行走模型（LR-SRW），总行走长度固定在O(L^d)以满足统计系统的广延性；3. 结合两种方法分析系统行为。
AI.result: 1. 当σ≤2时，二维长程海森堡系统通过单一连续相变表现出自发对称性破缺，并形成一般长程序；2. LR-SRW模型能准确描述二维和三维长程海森堡模型的低温标度行为（由Goldstone模涨落引起）；3. 基于LR-SRW的见解，提出了描述任意空间维度中具有连续对称性的长程统计系统相变和低温性质的一般准则。
AI.conclusion: 长程相互作用显著影响系统的相变和低温行为，LR-SRW模型为理解长程统计系统提供了有效工具，提出的新准则能更全面地描述这类系统的性质演化。

title: Anomalous Eigenstates of a Doped Hole in the Ising Antiferromagnet
summary: The problem of a mobile hole doped into an antiferromagnet Mott insulator is believed to underly the rich physics of several paradigmatic strongly correlated electron systems, ranging from heavy fermions to high-Tc superconductivity. Arguably the simplest incarnation of this problem corresponds to a doped Ising antiferromagnet, a problem widely considered essentially solved since almost 60 years by a popular yet approximate mapping to a single-particle problem on the Bethe lattice. Here we show that, despite its deceptive simplicity, the local spectrum of a single hole in a classical Ising-Néel state contains a series of anomalous, long-lived states that go beyond the well-known ladder-like spectrum with excited energies spaced as $J^{2/3} t^{1/3}$. The anomalous states we find through exact diagonalization and within the self-avoiding path approximation have excitation energies scaling approximately linear with $J$ and lead to a series of avoided crossings with the more pronounced ladder spectrum. By also computing different local, rotational spectra we explain the origin of the anomalous states as rooted in an approximate emergent local $C_3$ symmetry of the problem. From their direct spectral signatures we further conclude that these states lead to anomalously slow thermalization behavior -- hence representing a new type of quantum many-body scar state, potentially related to many-body scars predicted in lattice gauge theories.

AI.tldr: 该研究揭示了经典伊辛-奈尔态中单个空穴的局域谱存在一系列反常长寿命态，超越了传统的梯子状谱，这些态源于问题的近似涌现局域C3对称性，代表了一种新型量子多体疤痕态。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于对掺杂反铁磁莫特绝缘体中移动空穴问题的深入理解，这一问题被认为是重费米子和高温超导等强关联电子系统丰富物理的基础。尽管伊辛反铁磁体中的掺杂问题被认为已通过贝特晶格映射基本解决，但研究者发现其中存在未被认识的反常现象。
AI.method: 采用精确对角化方法和自回避路径近似，计算了经典伊辛-奈尔态中单个空穴的局域谱，并通过计算不同的局域旋转谱来分析反常态的起源。
AI.result: 发现了超越传统J^{2/3}t^{1/3}能量间距梯子状谱的一系列反常长寿命态，这些态的激发能量近似线性依赖于J，并与更显著的梯子谱形成一系列避免交叉。分析表明这些反常态源于问题的近似涌现局域C3对称性。
AI.conclusion: 这些反常态具有异常缓慢的热化行为特征，代表了一种新型的量子多体疤痕态，可能与晶格规范理论中预测的多体疤痕态相关，为理解强关联系统中的非平衡动力学提供了新视角。

title: Curvature-Aware Optimization of Noisy Variational Quantum Circuits via Weighted Projective Line Geometry
summary:
We develop a differential-geometric framework for variational quantum circuits in which noisy single- and multi-qubit parameter spaces are modeled by weighted projective lines (WPLs). Starting from the pure-state Bloch sphere CP1, we show that realistic hardware noise induces anisotropic contractions of the Bloch ball that can be represented by a pair of physically interpretable parameters (lambda_perp, lambda_parallel). These parameters determine a unique WPL metric g_WPL(a_over_b, b) whose scalar curvature is R = 2 / b^2, yielding a compact and channel-resolved geometric surrogate for the intrinsic information structure of noisy quantum circuits.
  We develop a tomography-to-geometry pipeline that extracts (lambda_perp, lambda_parallel) from hardware data and maps them to the WPL parameters (a_over_b, b, R). Experiments on IBM Quantum backends show that the resulting WPL geometries accurately capture anisotropic curvature deformation across calibration periods. Finally, we demonstrate that WPL-informed quantum natural gradients (WPL-QNG) provide stable optimization dynamics for noisy variational quantum eigensolvers and enable curvature-aware mitigation of barren plateaus.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个用于变分量子电路的微分几何框架，将噪声量子硬件建模为加权投影线，通过几何参数捕捉噪声的各向异性收缩，并开发了从硬件数据提取几何参数的流程。
AI.motivation: 传统量子电路分析缺乏对硬件噪声几何结构的系统描述，需要一种能够捕捉噪声各向异性效应并指导优化过程的几何框架。
AI.method: 1. 将噪声单/多量子比特参数空间建模为加权投影线；2. 从纯态Bloch球面出发，用物理可解释参数(λ⊥, λ∥)描述噪声引起的各向异性Bloch球收缩；3. 建立WPL度量g_WPL(a/b,b)，其标量曲率R=2/b²；4. 开发从硬件数据提取几何参数的层析到几何流程；5. 提出WPL启发的量子自然梯度优化方法。
AI.result: 1. 在IBM Quantum后端实验中，WPL几何准确捕捉了校准周期内的各向异性曲率变形；2. WPL-QNG为噪声变分量子本征求解器提供了稳定的优化动态；3. 实现了曲率感知的贫瘠高原缓解。
AI.conclusion: 该微分几何框架为噪声量子电路提供了紧凑且通道解析的几何表征，能够有效指导优化过程并缓解量子计算中的贫瘠高原问题。

title: Dilute Limit Coarsening with an Anisotropic Surface Tension
summary: We investigate the impact of an anisotropic surface tension on the late-stage dilute phase separation dynamics, revisiting the seminal Lifshitz-Slyozov (LS) theory, which traditionally relies on the assumption of isotropic surface tension. Using a perturbative treatment for weak anisotropy, we demonstrate that although the characteristic $t^{1/3}$ drop growth law remains unchanged, the anisotropy causes a significant breakdown of morphological universality. Specifically, we calculate explicitly a one-parameter family of nonequilibrium drop shapes that depend on the scaled drop size. These shapes are close to the equilibrium Wulff shape, but the smaller drops are more spherical and the larger drops have an enhanced anisotropy in comparison to the Wulff shape. We also demonstrate that the the drop size distribution is modified from the isotropic LS distribution at second order in the anisotropy strength.

AI.tldr: 各向异性表面张力对稀相分离后期动力学的影响：虽然液滴生长仍遵循t^{1/3}规律，但形态普遍性被破坏，液滴形状随尺寸变化，尺寸分布也发生改变。
AI.motivation: 重新审视经典的Lifshitz-Slyozov理论，该理论传统上假设表面张力是各向同性的。研究各向异性表面张力对稀相分离后期动力学的影响，探索各向异性如何改变相分离过程的形态演化。
AI.method: 采用微扰处理方法处理弱各向异性情况，计算非平衡液滴形状和尺寸分布的变化。通过理论分析推导各向异性表面张力下的动力学方程。
AI.result: 虽然特征性的t^{1/3}液滴生长规律保持不变，但各向异性导致形态普遍性显著破坏。计算得到依赖于缩放液滴尺寸的单参数非平衡液滴形状族，这些形状接近平衡Wulff形状，但较小液滴更接近球形，较大液滴的各向异性比Wulff形状更强。液滴尺寸分布在各向异性强度的二阶项上偏离各向同性LS分布。
AI.conclusion: 各向异性表面张力在保持基本生长规律的同时，显著改变了稀相分离后期的形态演化和尺寸分布，破坏了传统LS理论中的形态普遍性，为理解各向异性材料中的相分离过程提供了新的理论框架。

title: SpeContext: Enabling Efficient Long-context Reasoning with Speculative Context Sparsity in LLMs
summary: In this paper, we point out that the objective of the retrieval algorithms is to align with the LLM, which is similar to the objective of knowledge distillation in LLMs. We analyze the similarity in information focus between the distilled language model(DLM) and the original LLM from the perspective of information theory, and thus propose a novel paradigm that leverages a DLM as the retrieval algorithm. Based on the insight, we present SpeContext, an algorithm and system co-design for long-context reasoning. (1) At the algorithm level, SpeContext proposes lightweight retrieval head based on the head-level attention weights of DLM, achieving > 90% parameters reduction by pruning the redundancy. (2) At the system level, SpeContext designs an asynchronous prefetch dataflow via the elastic loading strategy, effectively overlapping KV cache retrieval with the LLM computation. (3) At the compilation level, SpeContext constructs the theoretical memory model and implements an adaptive memory management system to achieve acceleration by maximizing GPU memory utilization. We deploy and evaluate SpeContext in two resourceconstrained environments, cloud and edge. Extensive experiments show that, compared with the Huggingface framework, SpeContext achieves up to 24.89x throughput improvement in cloud and 10.06x speedup in edge with negligible accuracy loss, pushing the Pareto frontier of accuracy and throughput.

AI.tldr: SpeContext：利用蒸馏语言模型作为检索算法，通过算法-系统-编译协同设计实现长上下文推理加速，在云和边缘环境中分别实现24.89倍和10.06倍吞吐量提升
AI.motivation: 传统检索算法目标与LLM对齐，这与LLM知识蒸馏的目标相似。从信息论角度分析蒸馏语言模型与原始LLM在信息关注上的相似性，提出利用DLM作为检索算法的新范式，以解决长上下文推理的效率问题。
AI.method: 1. 算法层面：基于DLM的注意力头权重设计轻量级检索头，通过剪枝冗余实现>90%参数减少；2. 系统层面：通过弹性加载策略设计异步预取数据流，重叠KV缓存检索与LLM计算；3. 编译层面：构建理论内存模型并实现自适应内存管理系统，最大化GPU内存利用率。
AI.result: 在云和边缘两种资源受限环境中部署评估，相比Huggingface框架，SpeContext在云端实现最高24.89倍吞吐量提升，边缘端实现10.06倍加速，准确率损失可忽略，推进了准确率与吞吐量的帕累托前沿。
AI.conclusion: SpeContext通过算法-系统-编译协同设计，成功利用蒸馏语言模型作为高效检索算法，在保持准确率的同时显著提升长上下文推理性能，为资源受限环境中的LLM部署提供了有效解决方案。

title: Challenges of Heterogeneity in Big Data: A Comparative Study of Classification in Large-Scale Structured and Unstructured Domains
comment: 13 pages, 1 figure, 3 tables. Comparative study involving Apache Spark and Hyperparameter Optimization. Keywords: Big Data, NLP, Tabular Data
summary: This study analyzes the impact of heterogeneity ("Variety") in Big Data by comparing classification strategies across structured (Epsilon) and unstructured (Rest-Mex, IMDB) domains. A dual methodology was implemented: evolutionary and Bayesian hyperparameter optimization (Genetic Algorithms, Optuna) in Python for numerical data, and distributed processing in Apache Spark for massive textual corpora. The results reveal a "complexity paradox": in high-dimensional spaces, optimized linear models (SVM, Logistic Regression) outperformed deep architectures and Gradient Boosting. Conversely, in text-based domains, the constraints of distributed fine-tuning led to overfitting in complex models, whereas robust feature engineering -- specifically Transformer-based embeddings (ROBERTa) and Bayesian Target Encoding -- enabled simpler models to generalize effectively. This work provides a unified framework for algorithm selection based on data nature and infrastructure constraints.

AI.tldr: 研究分析了大数据异质性对分类策略的影响，发现高维数值数据中优化线性模型优于复杂模型，而文本数据中简单模型配合特征工程效果更好。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是分析大数据异质性（"多样性"）对分类策略的影响，比较结构化（数值）和非结构化（文本）数据领域的分类方法效果差异。
AI.method: 采用双重方法论：针对数值数据使用进化和贝叶斯超参数优化（遗传算法、Optuna），针对大规模文本语料使用Apache Spark分布式处理。使用Transformer嵌入（ROBERTa）和贝叶斯目标编码进行特征工程。
AI.result: 发现"复杂性悖论"：在高维数值空间（Epsilon数据集）中，优化后的线性模型（SVM、逻辑回归）优于深度架构和梯度提升；而在文本领域（Rest-Mex、IMDB），复杂模型因分布式微调限制而过拟合，简单模型配合特征工程泛化效果更好。
AI.conclusion: 研究提出了基于数据特性和基础设施约束的统一算法选择框架，为大数据分类任务提供了方法论指导。

title: Weighted Projective Line ZX Calculus: Quantized Orbifold Geometry for Quantum Compilation
summary:
We develop a unified geometric framework for quantum circuit compilation based on quantized orbifold phases and their diagrammatic semantics. Physical qubit platforms impose heterogeneous phase resolutions, anisotropic Bloch-ball contractions, and hardware-dependent $2π$ winding behavior. We show that these effects admit a natural description on the weighted projective line $\mathbb{P}(a,b)$, whose orbifold points encode discrete phase grids and whose monodromy captures winding accumulation under realistic noise channels.
  Building on this geometry, we introduce the WPL--ZX calculus, an extension of the standard ZX formalism in which each spider carries a weight--phase--winding triple $(a,α,k)$. We prove soundness of LCM-based fusion and normalization rules, derive curvature predictors for phase-grid compatibility, and present the Weighted ZX Circuit Compression (WZCC) algorithm, which performs geometry-aware optimization on heterogeneous phase lattices.
  To connect circuit-level structure with fault-tolerant architectures, we introduce Monodromy-Aware Surface-Code Decoding (MASD), a winding-regularized modification of minimum-weight matching on syndrome graphs. MASD incorporates orbifold-weighted edge costs, producing monotone decoder-risk metrics and improved robustness across phase-quantized noise models.
  All results are validated through symbolic and numerical simulations, demonstrating that quantized orbifold geometry provides a coherent and hardware-relevant extension of diagrammatic quantum compilation.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个基于量子化轨道折叠相位的统一几何框架，用于量子电路编译，通过加权射影线描述硬件相关的相位分辨率，并开发了WPL-ZX演算和WZCC算法进行几何感知优化。
AI.motivation: 物理量子比特平台存在异质相位分辨率、各向异性Bloch球收缩和硬件相关的2π缠绕行为等问题，需要统一的几何框架来描述这些效应，以改进量子电路编译。
AI.method: 1. 使用加权射影线ℙ(a,b)描述轨道折叠相位几何；2. 开发WPL-ZX演算，扩展标准ZX形式，每个蜘蛛携带权重-相位-缠绕三元组；3. 提出WZCC算法进行几何感知优化；4. 引入MASD解码器，在症候图中使用缠绕正则化最小权重匹配。
AI.result: 通过符号和数值模拟验证了所有结果，证明量子化轨道折叠几何为图解量子编译提供了连贯且硬件相关的扩展，改进了相位网格兼容性和解码鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 量子化轨道折叠几何为量子电路编译提供了一个统一的几何框架，能够有效处理硬件相关的相位分辨率问题，并通过几何感知优化和解码改进，增强了量子计算在现实噪声环境下的鲁棒性。

title: Geometric Regularity in Deterministic Sampling of Diffusion-based Generative Models
comment: 57 pages. Accepted by Journal of Statistical Mechanics: Theory and Experiment (2025). The short version was published in ICML 2024. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2405.11326
summary: Diffusion-based generative models employ stochastic differential equations (SDEs) and their equivalent probability flow ordinary differential equations (ODEs) to establish a smooth transformation between complex high-dimensional data distributions and tractable prior distributions. In this paper, we reveal a striking geometric regularity in the deterministic sampling dynamics of diffusion generative models: each simulated sampling trajectory along the gradient field lies within an extremely low-dimensional subspace, and all trajectories exhibit an almost identical boomerang shape, regardless of the model architecture, applied conditions, or generated content. We characterize several intriguing properties of these trajectories, particularly under closed-form solutions based on kernel-estimated data modeling. We also demonstrate a practical application of the discovered trajectory regularity by proposing a dynamic programming-based scheme to better align the sampling time schedule with the underlying trajectory structure. This simple strategy requires minimal modification to existing deterministic numerical solvers, incurs negligible computational overhead, and achieves superior image generation performance, especially in regions with only 5 - 10 function evaluations.

AI.tldr: 扩散生成模型的确定性采样轨迹具有惊人的几何规律性：所有轨迹都位于极低维子空间中，呈现几乎相同的"回旋镖"形状，且不受模型架构、条件或生成内容影响。
AI.motivation: 揭示扩散生成模型中确定性采样动态的几何规律性，理解采样轨迹的结构特征，并利用这些发现改进采样效率。
AI.method: 分析扩散生成模型的确定性采样轨迹，发现其位于极低维子空间且形状相似；基于核估计数据建模的闭式解研究轨迹特性；提出基于动态规划的方案，使采样时间表与轨迹结构更好对齐。
AI.result: 发现扩散生成模型的采样轨迹具有惊人的几何规律性：所有轨迹都位于极低维子空间，呈现几乎相同的"回旋镖"形状；提出的动态规划方案只需对现有数值求解器进行最小修改，计算开销可忽略，在5-10次函数评估区域显著提升图像生成性能。
AI.conclusion: 扩散生成模型的确定性采样轨迹展现出强烈的几何规律性，这一发现不仅深化了对采样过程的理解，而且可以用于设计更高效的采样策略，通过使采样时间表与轨迹结构对齐来提升生成质量。

title: Probing the "Psyche'' of Large Reasoning Models: Understanding Through a Human Lens
summary: Large reasoning models (LRMs) have garnered significant attention from researchers owing to their exceptional capability in addressing complex tasks. Motivated by the observed human-like behaviors in their reasoning processes, this paper introduces a comprehensive taxonomy to characterize atomic reasoning steps and probe the ``psyche'' of LRM intelligence. Specifically, it comprises five groups and seventeen categories derived from human mental processes, thereby grounding the understanding of LRMs in an interdisciplinary perspective. The taxonomy is then applied for an in-depth understanding of current LRMs, resulting in a distinct labeled dataset that comprises 277,534 atomic reasoning steps. Using this resource, we analyze contemporary LRMs and distill several actionable takeaways for improving training and post-training of reasoning models. Notably, our analysis reveals that prevailing post-answer ``double-checks'' (self-monitoring evaluations) are largely superficial and rarely yield substantive revisions. Thus, incentivizing comprehensive multi-step reflection, rather than simple self-monitoring, may offer a more effective path forward. To complement the taxonomy, an automatic annotation framework, named CAPO, is proposed to leverage large language models (LLMs) for generating the taxonomy-based annotations. Experimental results demonstrate that CAPO achieves higher consistency with human experts compared to baselines, facilitating a scalable and comprehensive analysis of LRMs from a human cognitive perspective. Together, the taxonomy, CAPO, and the derived insights provide a principled, scalable path toward understanding and advancing LRM reasoning.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个基于人类心智过程的分类法来理解大型推理模型（LRMs）的"心理"，开发了自动标注框架CAPO，并基于对277,534个原子推理步骤的分析揭示了当前模型的局限性。
AI.motivation: 大型推理模型在复杂任务中展现出类人推理能力，但缺乏系统化的理解框架。研究者希望从人类认知角度建立分类法，深入探究LRMs的推理"心理"机制。
AI.method: 1. 基于人类心智过程构建包含5组17类的分类法；2. 应用该分类法创建包含277,534个原子推理步骤的标注数据集；3. 开发自动标注框架CAPO，利用大语言模型生成分类法标注；4. 分析当代LRMs的推理模式。
AI.result: 1. CAPO框架在标注一致性上优于基线方法；2. 分析发现当前模型的"双重检查"（自我监控评估）大多流于表面，很少产生实质性修订；3. 揭示了激励多步反思比简单自我监控更有效；4. 为改进推理模型的训练和后训练提供了可操作的见解。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提供了从人类认知角度理解和推进LRM推理的原则性、可扩展路径，分类法、CAPO框架和洞察共同构成了系统分析LRMs的基础工具集。

title: Gradient Inversion in Federated Reinforcement Learning
summary: Federated reinforcement learning (FRL) enables distributed learning of optimal policies while preserving local data privacy through gradient sharing.However, FRL faces the risk of data privacy leaks, where attackers exploit shared gradients to reconstruct local training data.Compared to traditional supervised federated learning, successful reconstruction in FRL requires the generated data not only to match the shared gradients but also to align with real transition dynamics of the environment (i.e., aligning with the real data transition distribution).To address this issue, we propose a novel attack method called Regularization Gradient Inversion Attack (RGIA), which enforces prior-knowledge-based regularization on states, rewards, and transition dynamics during the optimization process to ensure that the reconstructed data remain close to the true transition distribution.Theoretically, we prove that the prior-knowledge-based regularization term narrows the solution space from a broad set containing spurious solutions to a constrained subset that satisfies both gradient matching and true transition dynamics.Extensive experiments on control tasks and autonomous driving tasks demonstrate that RGIA can effectively constrain reconstructed data transition distributions and thus successfully reconstruct local private data.

AI.tldr: RGIA是一种针对联邦强化学习的梯度反演攻击方法，通过引入状态、奖励和转移动态的先验知识正则化，确保重构数据符合真实环境转移分布，从而成功恢复本地私有数据。
AI.motivation: 联邦强化学习虽然通过梯度共享保护数据隐私，但仍面临隐私泄露风险。与传统监督联邦学习不同，FRL中的成功重构不仅需要匹配共享梯度，还需要与环境的真实转移动态保持一致。现有攻击方法难以同时满足这两个条件。
AI.method: 提出正则化梯度反演攻击（RGIA），在优化过程中对状态、奖励和转移动态施加基于先验知识的正则化约束，确保重构数据接近真实转移分布。理论证明该正则化项将解空间从包含虚假解的广泛集合缩小到同时满足梯度匹配和真实转移动态的约束子集。
AI.result: 在控制任务和自动驾驶任务上的大量实验表明，RGIA能够有效约束重构数据的转移分布，从而成功重构本地私有数据。
AI.conclusion: RGIA通过引入先验知识正则化，解决了FRL中梯度反演攻击的关键挑战，即确保重构数据符合真实环境动态，为FRL的隐私保护提出了新的安全挑战。

title: Heterometallic spin-1/2 quantum magnet under hydrostatic pressure
summary: We investigate the properties of CuVOF$_4$(H$_2$O)$_6$$\cdot$H$_2$O, in which two different spin species, Cu(II) and V(IV), form antiferromagnetic spin-1/2 dimers with weak interdimer coupling provided via hydrogen bonding. Using radio-frequency susceptometry and electron-spin resonance (ESR), we show how the temperature-magnetic field spin-dimer phase diagram evolves as a function of applied hydrostatic pressure and correlate this with pressure-induced changes to the crystal structure. These results, coupled with pressure-tuned DFT calculations, confirm the prior prediction that the primary exchange interaction is mediated via an unusual mechanism in which the V(IV) ions provide considerable spin density to the oxygen that joins the two spins in each dimer and which lies along the Jahn-Teller axis of the Cu(II) ion. In addition, the dissimilarity in the spins that make up each dimer unit leads to a non-linear field dependence of the electronic energy levels as detected in the ESR measurements.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过高压实验和理论计算揭示了CuVOF₄(H₂O)₆·H₂O中Cu(II)和V(IV)自旋-1/2二聚体的交换相互作用机制，发现其通过V(IV)向氧原子提供自旋密度的非传统机制实现。
AI.motivation: 研究CuVOF₄(H₂O)₆·H₂O中不同自旋物种Cu(II)和V(IV)形成的反铁磁自旋-1/2二聚体，探索其交换相互作用的非传统机制以及压力对相图的影响。
AI.method: 采用射频磁化率测量和电子自旋共振(ESR)技术，结合高压实验和压力调谐的密度泛函理论(DFT)计算，分析温度-磁场相图随静水压力的变化。
AI.result: 实验证实了先前预测：主要交换相互作用通过V(IV)离子向连接两个自旋的氧原子提供显著自旋密度的非传统机制实现，该氧原子位于Cu(II)离子的Jahn-Teller轴上。ESR测量还发现二聚体单元中自旋的不相似性导致电子能级的非线性磁场依赖。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了CuVOF₄(H₂O)₆·H₂O中Cu(II)-V(IV)自旋二聚体的独特交换机制，为理解不同自旋物种间的磁相互作用提供了重要见解。

title: DyLoC: A Dual-Layer Architecture for Secure and Trainable Quantum Machine Learning Under Polynomial-DLA constraint
summary: Variational quantum circuits face a critical trade-off between privacy and trainability. High expressivity required for robust privacy induces exponentially large dynamical Lie algebras. This structure inevitably leads to barren plateaus. Conversely, trainable models restricted to polynomial-sized algebras remain transparent to algebraic attacks. To resolve this impasse, DyLoC is proposed. This dual-layer architecture employs an orthogonal decoupling strategy. Trainability is anchored to a polynomial-DLA ansatz while privacy is externalized to the input and output interfaces. Specifically, Truncated Chebyshev Graph Encoding (TCGE) is employed to thwart snapshot inversion. Dynamic Local Scrambling (DLS) is utilized to obfuscate gradients. Experiments demonstrate that DyLoC maintains baseline-level convergence with a final loss of 0.186. It outperforms the baseline by increasing the gradient reconstruction error by 13 orders of magnitude. Furthermore, snapshot inversion attacks are blocked when the reconstruction mean squared error exceeds 2.0. These results confirm that DyLoC effectively establishes a verifiable pathway for secure and trainable quantum machine learning.

AI.tldr: DyLoC提出了一种双层的量子电路架构，通过正交解耦策略解决了量子机器学习中隐私与可训练性之间的关键权衡问题。
AI.motivation: 变分量子电路面临隐私与可训练性的关键权衡：高表达能力（确保隐私）会导致指数级大的动态李代数，从而引发贫瘠高原问题；而可训练模型（限制为多项式大小的代数）则容易受到代数攻击。
AI.method: DyLoC采用双层的正交解耦架构：将可训练性锚定在多项式DLA的ansatz上，而将隐私外部化到输入和输出接口。具体使用截断切比雪夫图编码（TCGE）来阻止快照反演攻击，使用动态局部置乱（DLS）来混淆梯度。
AI.result: DyLoC保持了基线水平的收敛性（最终损失0.186），将梯度重构误差提高了13个数量级，当重构均方误差超过2.0时能够有效阻止快照反演攻击。
AI.conclusion: DyLoC为安全且可训练的量子机器学习建立了一条可验证的路径，有效解决了隐私保护与模型可训练性之间的根本矛盾。

title: Generalized Deutsch-Jozsa Algorithm for Applications in Data Classification, Logistic Regression, and Quantum Key Distribution
summary: We present a generalized Deutsch-Jozsa (DJ) quantum algorithm that not only determines both the global type of an unknown Boolean function (constant or balanced) but also determines explicit output values of the function in a single oracle query. Unlike the original DJ algorithm, which identifies only whether a function is constant or balanced, our generalization retrieves actual function output values at the same time with using a Bell state as ancilla. This makes a richer function characterization with minimal queries to have practical quantum advantages, e.g. data classification, logistic regression, and quantum cryptography.

AI.tldr: 提出广义Deutsch-Jozsa量子算法，不仅能判断布尔函数的全局类型（常数或平衡），还能在单次查询中获取函数的具体输出值。
AI.motivation: 原始Deutsch-Jozsa算法只能判断函数是常数还是平衡类型，无法获取具体函数值。需要一种更丰富的函数表征方法，在最小查询次数下获得实际量子优势。
AI.method: 使用贝尔态作为辅助量子比特，构建广义Deutsch-Jozsa算法，在单次oracle查询中同时确定函数类型和具体输出值。
AI.result: 新算法在单次查询中同时获得函数的全局类型信息和具体输出值，相比原始算法提供更丰富的函数表征能力。
AI.conclusion: 广义Deutsch-Jozsa算法在数据分类、逻辑回归和量子密码学等领域具有实际量子优势，实现了更高效的函数表征。

title: BioPro: On Difference-Aware Gender Fairness for Vision-Language Models
summary: Vision-Language Models (VLMs) inherit significant social biases from their training data, notably in gender representation. Current fairness interventions often adopt a difference-unaware perspective that enforces uniform treatment across demographic groups. These approaches, however, fail to distinguish between contexts where neutrality is required and those where group-specific attributes are legitimate and must be preserved. Building upon recent advances in difference-aware fairness for text-only models, we extend this concept to the multimodal domain and formalize the problem of difference-aware gender fairness for image captioning and text-to-image generation. We advocate for selective debiasing, which aims to mitigate unwanted bias in neutral contexts while preserving valid distinctions in explicit ones. To achieve this, we propose BioPro (Bias Orthogonal Projection), an entirely training-free framework. BioPro identifies a low-dimensional gender-variation subspace through counterfactual embeddings and applies projection to selectively neutralize gender-related information. Experiments show that BioPro effectively reduces gender bias in neutral cases while maintaining gender faithfulness in explicit ones, thus providing a promising direction toward achieving selective fairness in VLMs. Beyond gender bias, we further demonstrate that BioPro can effectively generalize to continuous bias variables, such as scene brightness, highlighting its broader applicability.

AI.tldr: BioPro是一个无需训练的多模态去偏框架，通过识别性别变化子空间并选择性投影，在需要中性的场景减少性别偏见，在明确场景保留性别特征。
AI.motivation: 当前视觉语言模型的公平性干预通常采用"差异无视"视角，对所有人口统计群体实施统一处理。这种方法无法区分需要中性的场景和需要保留群体特定属性的场景，导致过度泛化或不足。
AI.method: 提出BioPro（Bias Orthogonal Projection）框架：1）通过反事实嵌入识别低维性别变化子空间；2）应用投影选择性中和性别相关信息；3）完全无需训练，可扩展到连续偏差变量如场景亮度。
AI.result: 实验表明BioPro在需要中性的情况下有效减少性别偏见，在明确场景中保持性别忠实性，为VLMs实现选择性公平提供了有前景的方向。还能有效推广到连续偏差变量。
AI.conclusion: BioPro通过差异感知的公平性方法，在视觉语言模型中实现了选择性去偏，平衡了中性场景的去偏需求和明确场景的特征保留，具有更广泛的适用性。

title: Tracing Mathematical Proficiency Through Problem-Solving Processes
summary: Knowledge Tracing (KT) aims to model student's knowledge state and predict future performance to enable personalized learning in Intelligent Tutoring Systems. However, traditional KT methods face fundamental limitations in explainability, as they rely solely on the response correctness, neglecting the rich information embedded in students' problem-solving processes. To address this gap, we propose Knowledge Tracing Leveraging Problem-Solving Process (KT-PSP), which incorporates students' problem-solving processes to capture the multidimensional aspects of mathematical proficiency. We also introduce KT-PSP-25, a new dataset specifically designed for the KT-PSP. Building on this, we present StatusKT, a KT framework that employs a teacher-student-teacher three-stage LLM pipeline to extract students' MP as intermediate signals. In this pipeline, the teacher LLM first extracts problem-specific proficiency indicators, then a student LLM generates responses based on the student's solution process, and a teacher LLM evaluates these responses to determine mastery of each indicator. The experimental results on KT-PSP-25 demonstrate that StatusKT improves the prediction performance of existing KT methods. Moreover, StatusKT provides interpretable explanations for its predictions by explicitly modeling students' mathematical proficiency.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出KT-PSP框架，通过整合学生解题过程信息来改进知识追踪，并引入StatusKT三阶段LLM管道来提取数学能力指标，在KT-PSP-25数据集上验证了性能提升和可解释性。
AI.motivation: 传统知识追踪方法仅依赖答题正确性，缺乏可解释性，忽略了学生解题过程中蕴含的丰富信息，无法全面评估学生的数学能力。
AI.method: 提出KT-PSP框架整合解题过程信息，并设计StatusKT三阶段LLM管道：教师LLM提取问题特定能力指标，学生LLM基于解题过程生成回答，教师LLM评估回答确定指标掌握程度。
AI.result: 在KT-PSP-25数据集上的实验表明，StatusKT显著提升了现有知识追踪方法的预测性能，同时通过显式建模学生数学能力提供了可解释的预测解释。
AI.conclusion: 通过整合学生解题过程信息，KT-PSP框架能够更全面、可解释地追踪学生知识状态，为个性化学习系统提供更有效的支持。

title: Information conservation relations for weak measurement and its reversal
summary:
We investigate the information distribution among different entities in the weak measurements protocol. Focusing on multilevel, decaying systems under continuous (no-click) monitoring, we derive exact, conservation-type information relations that hold for each outcome in the record. Analogous relations hold when an explicit reversal is applied, with the reversal success probability entering the relation.
  We extend the framework to finite-count outcomes (arbitrary photon numbers) obtaining quantitative trade-offs that link information change in the weak measurement process to the entities to which the information is distributed. These results provide a unified, outcome-resolved account of information flow in monitored open quantum dynamics and provide insight into a deeper understanding of open-system dynamics and its control.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了弱测量协议中不同实体间的信息分布，针对多级衰变系统在连续监测下的信息守恒关系，并扩展到有限计数结果，建立了信息变化与信息分布实体之间的定量权衡关系。
AI.motivation: 研究弱测量协议中信息在不同实体间的分布情况，特别是在多级衰变系统和连续监测条件下，旨在深入理解开放量子动力学中的信息流动机制。
AI.method: 针对多级衰变系统在连续（无点击）监测下的情况，推导了精确的信息守恒关系；扩展到有限计数结果（任意光子数），建立了信息变化与信息分布实体之间的定量权衡关系；研究了显式反转操作下的信息关系。
AI.result: 推导出了在记录中每个结果都成立的信息守恒关系；建立了信息变化与信息分布实体之间的定量权衡关系；发现反转成功概率进入信息关系中；提供了对监测开放量子动力学中信息流动的统一、结果解析的描述。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为监测开放量子动力学中的信息流动提供了统一的框架，深化了对开放系统动力学及其控制的理解，揭示了弱测量过程中信息变化与信息分布实体之间的定量关系。

title: Med-CMR: A Fine-Grained Benchmark Integrating Visual Evidence and Clinical Logic for Medical Complex Multimodal Reasoning
summary: MLLMs MLLMs are beginning to appear in clinical workflows, but their ability to perform complex medical reasoning remains unclear. We present Med-CMR, a fine-grained Medical Complex Multimodal Reasoning benchmark. Med-CMR distinguishes from existing counterparts by three core features: 1) Systematic capability decomposition, splitting medical multimodal reasoning into fine-grained visual understanding and multi-step reasoning to enable targeted evaluation; 2) Challenging task design, with visual understanding across three key dimensions (small-object detection, fine-detail discrimination, spatial understanding) and reasoning covering four clinically relevant scenarios (temporal prediction, causal reasoning, long-tail generalization, multi-source integration); 3) Broad, high-quality data coverage, comprising 20,653 Visual Question Answering (VQA) pairs spanning 11 organ systems and 12 imaging modalities, validated via a rigorous two-stage (human expert + model-assisted) review to ensure clinical authenticity. We evaluate 18 state-of-the-art MLLMs with Med-CMR, revealing GPT-5 as the top-performing commercial model: 57.81 accuracy on multiple-choice questions (MCQs) and a 48.70 open-ended score, outperforming Gemini 2.5 Pro (49.87 MCQ accuracy, 45.98 open-ended score) and leading open-source model Qwen3-VL-235B-A22B (49.34 MCQ accuracy, 42.62 open-ended score). However, specialized medical MLLMs do not reliably outperform strong general models, and long-tail generalization emerges as the dominant failure mode. Med-CMR thus provides a stress test for visual-reasoning integration and rare-case robustness in medical MLLMs, and a rigorous yardstick for future clinical systems.

AI.tldr: Med-CMR是一个细粒度的医学复杂多模态推理基准，用于评估MLLMs在临床工作流程中的复杂医学推理能力，包含20,653个VQA对，涵盖11个器官系统和12种成像模态。
AI.motivation: MLLMs开始出现在临床工作流程中，但其执行复杂医学推理的能力尚不清楚，需要建立一个能够系统评估医学多模态推理能力的基准。
AI.method: 1) 系统能力分解：将医学多模态推理分解为细粒度的视觉理解和多步推理；2) 挑战性任务设计：视觉理解涵盖三个关键维度（小物体检测、细节辨别、空间理解），推理涵盖四个临床相关场景（时间预测、因果推理、长尾泛化、多源整合）；3) 广泛高质量数据覆盖：包含20,653个VQA对，经过两阶段（人类专家+模型辅助）严格审查。
AI.result: 评估了18个最先进的MLLMs，GPT-5表现最佳：多选题准确率57.81%，开放式问题得分48.70%，优于Gemini 2.5 Pro和开源模型Qwen3-VL-235B-A22B。专业医学MLLMs并未可靠地优于强大的通用模型，长尾泛化成为主要失败模式。
AI.conclusion: Med-CMR为医学MLLMs的视觉-推理整合和罕见病例鲁棒性提供了压力测试，并为未来临床系统提供了严格的衡量标准。

title: Introducing AI-Driven IoT Energy Management Framework
comment: Accepted in IEEE Smart World Congress 2025, Calgary, Canada
summary: Power consumption has become a critical aspect of modern life due to the consistent reliance on technological advancements. Reducing power consumption or following power usage predictions can lead to lower monthly costs and improved electrical reliability. The proposal of a holistic framework to establish a foundation for IoT systems with a focus on contextual decision making, proactive adaptation, and scalable structure. A structured process for IoT systems with accuracy and interconnected development would support reducing power consumption and support grid stability. This study presents the feasibility of this proposal through the application of each aspect of the framework. This system would have long term forecasting, short term forecasting, anomaly detection, and consideration of qualitative data with any energy management decisions taken. Performance was evaluated on Power Consumption Time Series data to display the direct application of the framework.

AI.tldr: 提出一个面向物联网系统的整体框架，通过上下文决策、主动适应和可扩展结构来降低能耗并支持电网稳定
AI.motivation: 现代生活对技术进步的持续依赖使得电力消耗成为关键问题，降低能耗或遵循用电预测可以降低月度成本并提高电力可靠性
AI.method: 提出一个整体框架，建立物联网系统基础，专注于上下文决策、主动适应和可扩展结构，包括长期预测、短期预测、异常检测和定性数据考虑
AI.result: 在电力消耗时间序列数据上评估性能，展示了框架的直接应用可行性
AI.conclusion: 通过框架各个方面的应用展示了该提案的可行性，系统将支持降低能耗和电网稳定

title: Adaptive prediction theory combining offline and online learning
summary: Real-world intelligence systems usually operate by combining offline learning and online adaptation with highly correlated and non-stationary system data or signals, which, however, has rarely been investigated theoretically in the literature. This paper initiates a theoretical investigation on the prediction performance of a two-stage learning framework combining offline and online algorithms for a class of nonlinear stochastic dynamical systems. For the offline-learning phase, we establish an upper bound on the generalization error for approximate nonlinear-least-squares estimation under general datasets with strong correlation and distribution shift, leveraging the Kullback-Leibler divergence to quantify the distributional discrepancies. For the online-adaptation phase, we address, on the basis of the offline-trained model, the possible uncertain parameter drift in real-world target systems by proposing a meta-LMS prediction algorithm. This two-stage framework, integrating offline learning with online adaptation, demonstrates superior prediction performances compared with either purely offline or online methods. Both theoretical guarantees and empirical studies are provided.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个结合离线学习和在线适应的两阶段学习框架，用于非线性随机动力系统的预测，理论分析了相关非平稳数据下的性能，并提出了meta-LMS在线预测算法。
AI.motivation: 现实智能系统通常结合离线学习和在线适应来处理高度相关且非平稳的系统数据，但现有文献缺乏对此的理论研究。本文旨在理论分析这种两阶段学习框架在非线性随机动力系统中的预测性能。
AI.method: 1. 离线学习阶段：建立近似非线性最小二乘估计在强相关数据和分布偏移下的泛化误差上界，利用KL散度量化分布差异；2. 在线适应阶段：基于离线训练模型，提出meta-LMS预测算法处理实际系统中可能的不确定参数漂移。
AI.result: 该两阶段框架（离线学习+在线适应）相比纯离线或纯在线方法展现出更优越的预测性能。研究提供了理论保证和实证研究支持。
AI.conclusion: 本文首次理论研究了结合离线学习和在线适应的两阶段学习框架在非线性随机动力系统中的预测性能，为处理现实世界中相关非平稳数据提供了理论依据和有效方法。

title: Random matrix perspective on probabilistic error cancellation
summary: Probabilistic error cancellation is an attempt to reverse the effect of dissipative noise channels on quantum computers by applying unphysical channels after the execution of a quantum algorithm on noisy hardware. We investigate on general grounds the properties of such unphysical quantum channels by considering a random matrix ensemble modeling noisy quantum algorithms. We show that the complex spectra of denoiser channels inherit their structure from random Lindbladians. Additional structure imposed by the locality of noise channels of the quantum computer emerges in terms of a hierarchy of timescales.

AI.tldr: 研究通过随机矩阵方法分析量子计算中概率误差消除技术使用的去噪通道的谱特性
AI.motivation: 概率误差消除技术试图通过在噪声量子硬件上执行算法后应用非物理通道来逆转耗散噪声通道的影响，需要深入理解这些去噪通道的特性
AI.method: 使用随机矩阵集合建模噪声量子算法，分析去噪通道的复谱结构，并考虑量子计算机噪声通道的局部性带来的时间尺度层次结构

title: Assessing model error in counterfactual worlds
summary: Counterfactual scenario modeling exercises that ask "what would happen if?" are one of the most common ways we plan for the future. Despite their ubiquity in planning and decision making, scenario projections are rarely evaluated retrospectively. Differences between projections and observations come from two sources: scenario deviation and model miscalibration. We argue the latter is most important for assessing the value of models in decision making, but requires estimating model error in counterfactual worlds. Here we present and contrast three approaches for estimating this error, and demonstrate the benefits and limitations of each in a simulation experiment. We provide recommendations for the estimation of counterfactual error and discuss the components of scenario design that are required to make scenario projections evaluable.

AI.tldr: 论文提出三种评估反事实场景建模中模型误差的方法，强调模型校准误差比场景偏差更重要，为决策提供更可靠评估
AI.motivation: 反事实场景建模在规划和决策中广泛应用，但很少进行回顾性评估。预测与观测的差异来自场景偏差和模型校准误差，后者对评估模型在决策中的价值更为重要，但需要在反事实世界中估计模型误差
AI.method: 提出并对比三种估计反事实误差的方法，通过模拟实验展示每种方法的优缺点，提供反事实误差估计的建议
AI.result: 通过模拟实验验证了三种方法的有效性，分析了各自的优势和局限性，为反事实误差估计提供了实用指导
AI.conclusion: 模型校准误差比场景偏差对决策评估更重要，需要专门方法在反事实世界中估计模型误差，同时讨论了使场景预测可评估所需的设计要素

title: Provable Memory Efficient Self-Play Algorithm for Model-free Reinforcement Learning
comment: ICLR 2024. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2110.04645 by other authors
summary: The thriving field of multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) studies how a group of interacting agents make decisions autonomously in a shared dynamic environment. Existing theoretical studies in this area suffer from at least two of the following obstacles: memory inefficiency, the heavy dependence of sample complexity on the long horizon and the large state space, the high computational complexity, non-Markov policy, non-Nash policy, and high burn-in cost. In this work, we take a step towards settling this problem by designing a model-free self-play algorithm \emph{Memory-Efficient Nash Q-Learning (ME-Nash-QL)} for two-player zero-sum Markov games, which is a specific setting of MARL. ME-Nash-QL is proven to enjoy the following merits.
